column2: Greetings from Thoucentric! We have an opening for O9 Consultant at Thoucentric, Bengaluru. Please share your updated resume along with details of your CCTC, ECTC and Notice Period.  Location - Bangalore  Mode of work  Hybrid Job Description Designation: O9 Consultant Experience: 5 to 15 years of relevant experience Role Summary: - The role requires individuals to: Build and execute strategies to ensure high levels of customer satisfaction on ongoing supply chain technology projects. Help develop account strategy and plan, that best leverages consulting team strengths. Leading a team working on multiple, geographically dispersed projects, and ensure all projects are delivered on time and exceed customer expectations. Successfully deliver Supply Chain Planning Consulting engagements across various industries, sectors and geographies specifically in various areas of Supply Chain Planning (Demand & Supply Planning, S&OP, Distribution Planning, MRP, Inventory Planning, Replenishment Planning and Network Optimization) Bring structure to unstructured environments. Deal with ambiguity and lead the teams to success in fast paced environment Assist clients in the selection, implementation, and adoption of supply chain solutions. Provide functional and business process expertise on a project which generally consists of consultants, subcontractors, remote global resources, and client employees. Manage cross-functional programs/projects involving multiple client stakeholders and vendors. Guide the clients on industry best practices / process benchmarks. Provide leadership and guidance to consultants in managing their deliverables and lead the teams to achieve highest standards, project discipline and accountability. Help in building Supply Chain practice at Thoucentric and help grow the company by participating in pre-sales activities, building new solutions / offering that can strengthen Thoucentrics capabilities in Supply Chain space. Create reusable assets to help accelerate delivery of solutions Juggle multiple and conflicting priorities in a timely and sensitive way. Act as solution architects with equal expertise in supply chain planning technology and domain. Educational Qualifications: Strong educational background from reputed engineering and management schools Required Skills: Understanding of supply chain planning processes including demand planning, supply planning, S&OP, and inventory optimization. 5 years to 15 years of work experience in Supply Chain Planning domain with technology exposure. Flexibility to work on any supply chain technology. Appropriate training would be provided if you would need to work on a different technology than what you have experience in. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to interact with internal and external stakeholders with emphasis on follow through and reporting Analytical and Problem-solving skills along with self-motivation to excel Meticulous planning skills with attention to detail and multi-tasking skills Ability to drive projects in a matrix management environment that includes influencing, efficiency, collaboration, candor, and openness with a focus on results orientation Ability to analyze large amount of data; R, Python, SQL knowledge is preferred. Desirable Skills : 2 implementations using at least one of the best-in-class supply chain software tools (e.g. Kinaxis) or custom built supply chain planning applications involving advanced algorithms (AI/ML) is highly desirable. About Thoucentric -  Thoucentric is the Consulting arm of Xoriant, a prominent digital engineering services company with 5000+ employees. We are headquartered in Bangalore with presence across multiple locations in India, US, UK, Singapore & Australia Globally. As the Consulting business of Xoriant, we help clients with Business Consulting, Program & Project Management, Digital Transformation, Product Management, Process & Technology Solutioning and Execution including Analytics & Emerging Tech areas cutting across functional areas such as Supply Chain, Finance & HR, Sales & Distribution across US, UK, Singapore and Australia. Our unique consulting framework allows us to focus on execution rather than pure advisory. We are working closely with marquee names in the global consumer & packaged goods (CPG) industry, new age tech and start-up ecosystem. Xoriant (Parent entity) started in 1990 and is a Sunnyvale, CA headquartered digital engineering firm with offices in the USA, Europe, and Asia. Xoriant is backed by ChrysCapital, a leading private equity firm. Our strengths are now combined with Xoriants capabilities in AI & Data, cloud, security and operations services proven for 30 years. We have been certified as "Great Place to Work" by AIM and have been ranked as "50 Best Firms for Data Scientists to Work For". We have an experienced consulting team of over 450+ world-class business and technology consultants based across six global locations, supporting clients through their expert insights, entrepreneurial approach and focus on delivery excellence. We have also built point solutions and products through Thoucentric labs using AI/ML in the supply chain space. Thank You! DEBIKA Talent Acquisition| Thoucentric Technologies Bangalore Offices (Innovator - ITPL, The HIVE - Mahadevapura, Helios - Kadubeesanahalli) US | UK | India (Bangalore, Hyderabad, Chennai, Mumbai, Delhi, Kolkata) | www.thoucentric.com |www.thouc-labs.ai Join Our Team | Thoucentric is now part of Xoriant Corporation  MSE Woman Achiever Award by Economic Times & SIDBI  Great Place to Work Certified 2023-24  Top 20 startups to work for in India by Great Place To Work  Top 10 Analytics companies to watch out for in India by Analytics India  40-under-40 in Supply Chain category by Celerity India

Opportunity   The Learning Technology Consultant is part of the Customer Onboarding team for Adobe Learning Manager (ALM) and is a key member who works on onboarding projects and is the technology advisor to our customers. He/She would be instrumental in understanding customer requirements, and working with internal Adobe teams to effectively onboard the customer by developing and delivering detailed technology solutions through consulting project activities. Technical responsibilities include problem identification, system architecture definition, hardware/software specification and/or design, implementation, testing, client training, and solution deployment. Project management activities include interaction with company and client managers and schedule monitoring. Performance is typically measured by the capture of the consulting engagement and/or delivery of agreed solutions within budgeted hours.    Key Skills   Determine Customer Requirements The Technology Consultant is responsible for translating business requirements into functional requirements for Adobe Learning Manager that can be used to define digital solutions within the framework of SaaS systems. Demonstrated experience conducting discovery workshops to identify techno-functional requirements for SAAS systems,     Customer Engagement The Technology Consultant should have a proven track record of managing customers and end-to-end implementation of SAAS solutions. The ability to "translate" business requirements to implementation paths is critical. He/She will have to work quickly to establish trust and be the technology advisor on the engagement. Strong consulting and   Program Management This role requires the ability to work on multiple projects at various stages of onboarding simultaneously. He/She must be able to manage their own schedules to ensure success of the Projects. Effectively communicate the project status, issues, risks in a timely manner to various stakeholders. Learning Technology and Learning Domain Expertise The incumbent must be familiar with the technologies that drive learning solutions, at an expert level. Experience in implementing/ supporting SAAS-based solutions preferably LMS/CMS. Demonstrated experience in system integrations using APIs and practical application of Internet protocols: HTTP, SMTP, DNS, LDAP, and FTP is critical.   Stakeholder Management The Consultant is responsible for managing internal stakeholders - working with Engineering, Product Management, Support, and Customer Success teams, and bringing in their expertise as required. column2: As an IFS (Industrial and Financial Systems) technical professional, your role involves working with the IFS Applications suite, an enterprise resource planning (ERP) software solution, to implement, customize, integrate, and support business processes for your clients or organization. Here's an overview of what your responsibilities might include: Implementation: You would be responsible for implementing the IFS Applications suite according to the specific requirements of your clients or organization. This involves configuring modules such as finance, human capital management, supply chain management, project management, and customer relationship management to meet business needs. Customization: While IFS Applications offers a wide range of functionality out of the box, you may need to customize the software to address unique business requirements. This could involve developing customizations using IFS's development framework, including modifications to forms, workflows, reports, and business logic. Integration: IFS Applications often need to integrate with other systems within an organization's IT landscape, such as legacy systems, third-party software, or external data sources. You would be involved in designing and implementing integration solutions using APIs, middleware, or data connectors to ensure seamless data exchange and workflow automation. Data Management: You would manage data within the IFS Applications suite, including data migration from legacy systems, data cleansing, validation, and ensuring data integrity and security. This may involve developing data migration scripts, performing data mapping, and conducting data quality checks. System Administration: You would perform system administration tasks such as user management, access control, configuration management, and system monitoring to ensure the smooth operation of IFS Applications. This may also include applying patches, upgrades, and troubleshooting technical issues as they arise. Training and Support: You would provide training and support to end-users to ensure they can effectively use IFS Applications to perform their daily tasks. This may involve conducting training sessions, creating documentation, and providing ongoing support to address user questions and issues. Reporting and Analytics: You would leverage the reporting and analytics capabilities of IFS Applications to provide stakeholders with insights into business performance, trends, and key metrics. This may involve designing and developing custom reports, dashboards, and analytics models to support decision-making and strategic planning. Compliance and Regulations: You would ensure that IFS Applications are configured and maintained in compliance with industry regulations, standards, and best practices. This may involve implementing security controls, audit trails, and data encryption to protect sensitive information and ensure regulatory compliance.
column11: IFS Applications, resource planning, configuration management, system administration, project management, customer relationship, relationship management, supply chain management, system monitoring, strategic planning

column2: Job Description: We are seeking a skilled and experienced SAP B1 Techno-Functional Consultant to join our team. column2: We are seeking an Associate Project Manager to support the delivery of multiple projects using our in-house IT platforms, mForm and mGrant, for CSR grant management and ME requirements of clients     The Associate Project Manager will work under the guidance of the Project Manager, but may also be responsible for independently leading a project as needed     As an Associate Project Manager at Dhwani Rural Information Systems, you will primarily be responsible for managing partner organizations for our clients in the social/development sector     This will include communication, documentation, reporting and data analytics     You will act as a point of contact with our CSR clients and the internal tech and non-tech teams at Dhwani, and be responsible for understanding client project details in Ed-Tech domain, documenting impact stories, writing newsletters reports, preparation of ME framework/log framework, digitization of the ME framework on the platform, giving software demos, requirement gathering for digitization, dashboard indicators and reporting framework design, data cleanup and upload process, training manual and other evolving roles     In this role, you will have the opportunity to work closely with leading CSRs on projects across India through multi-stakeholder coordination, strategic inputs and project management, and leveraging data and technology for social good to make a meaningful impact in the lives of people and communities     You will work with a team of experienced professionals and have the opportunity to learn and grow in your career             Requirements         Technical Requirements:       Experience of Report Writing, Proposal Writing, Documenting Impact stories from the field   Strong research skills (qualitative and quantitative, impact assessments, report writing, log frame design)   Experience on working with data in excel for data storage, data cleaning, data analysis   Exposure to different off-the-shelf survey solutions (Google Forms, Survey Monkey, Surveyor, etc.)   Experience in working on multiple projects in a fast-paced work environment   Proven track record of delivering projects on time and within budget   Experience with project management tools and techniques, including project planning, resource allocation, and stakeholder communication   Ability to work with cross-functional teams and manage external vendors and partners   Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships with clients and team members       Non-Technical Requirements:       Strong analytical and problem-solving skills   ?Ability to think strategically and identify opportunities for process improvements   Excellent organizational and leadership abilities   High level of motivation and dedication to delivering high-quality work   Commitment to continuous learning and professional development       Education:       Bachelor's degree in a relevant field such as Economics, Public Policy, Statistics, Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related discipline   Preference given to candidates with postgraduate education in a relevant field such as Rural Management, Public Policy, Economics, Social Studies, or Development Studies   Preference given to candidates with a degree from a reputable institution such as IRMA, APU, IIFM, XIMB, TISS, IIHMR or fellowship from YIF, Anubhav Lecture Series, India Fellow, Indian School of Public Policy, Gandhi, Teach for India, Genpact Fellowship       Experience:       Minimum 2 years of experience as an Analyst/Associate in a social/development sector focused organization such as an NGO, social impact consulting firm, CSR, think tank, or research organization   Experience working with IT platforms and software solutions is a plus

column2: Project description Job Location: Singapore    Luxoft is looking for an experienced and motivated Consultant who will assist the APAC team. This role will be based in Singapore, working closely together with the account management, the services team and collaborate with the product teams in France. You will join a team of experienced consultants and participate in the implementation and support of the application, the installation of new modules and features using: - NeoXam DataHub: the most comprehensive, efficient and customizable solution for centralized data management available on the market. The solution acts as a hub, a central repository and a user- oriented data management tool for data used or produced by financial institutions. - NeoXam IBOR: a uniquely independent and flexible Investment Book of Record, designed to provide Asset Managers with a single, comprehensive, and robust source of continuously up-to-date positions, valuations and forecasts, with increased quality, under multiple views. Responsibilities Participate in NeoXam DataHub and/or NeoXam IBOR implementations at some of the world's leading and most respected financial organizations Implement the software by carrying out NeoXam Datahub/IBOR software customization, workflow definition and optimization using NeoXam cutting edge technology platform Provide support in troubleshooting, and identifying and resolving any installation and implementation problems to the client's satisfaction within established time frames Provide best practice guidance to clients by leveraging technical expertise, NeoXam software knowledge and industry experience Ensure coordination and responsive follow-up to client needs and requirements, interfacing with the appropriate NeoXam departments and colleagues as needed Participate in client support efforts Provide project reports to NeoXam management and clients upon request Continuously keep up to date with NeoXam DataHub and/or NeoXam IBOR functional and technical features and improvements Identify and resolve any installation and implementation problems to the client's satisfaction within established time frames Added Responsibilities for Senior Consultant role: Manage the overall design and configuration activity by ensuring the team follows configuration / scripting/design guidelines Analyze the clients' needs, accompany and coach their teams and/or take charge of the product implementation, meet clients' requests, manage the client relation and coordination of the project Provide project management leadership under the responsibility of the Account Manager or Project Director Develop and conduct product training workshops for clients Skills Must have Engineering or Business school, Master's degree or equivalent Up to 7-8 years of experience with software implementation projects in the banking / financial industry within APAC region. Preferably those with a financial technology vendor or consulting company background. Hands-on coding experience in scripting language like Shell, Bash, Python, VB , Java Script. Candidate should be able to adapt to new programming language(s) Experience with RDBMS, Data Modeling, and SQL language Understanding of Enterprise Data Management and ETL techniques and processes Previous experience of financial data provider feeds such as Bloomberg, Refinitiv, ICE and others Deep knowledge of financial instruments such as Equities, Fixed Income and Derivatives Previous project experience with involvement in multiple stages of the project life cycle Independent, with own initiative and good interpersonal skills and are concerned about the quality of service provided Proactive and a real team player Excellent communication skills (verbal and written) Nice to have Understanding of any treasury trading platform and trade life cycle
column11: neoxam, and SQL language, Shell, RDBMS, Java Script., Bash, Data Modeling, VB, Python

column2: GENERAL JOB DESCRIPTION   As a JD Edwards Application   developer, you are responsible for understanding client requirements and how   they translate to new application features. Collaborating with functional   team to set specifications for new applications. Writing high-quality code to   program complete applications on schedule, this includes, retrofitting JDE   objects when required, making additional changes for new functionalities,   fixing bugs in existing changes, helping functional team troubleshoot issues,   working with CNC administrators to move the developed code from Dev through   test and production.    DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES   Understand business requirements and convert   them to technical specs in various JDE functional areas such as Finance,   HRMS, Manufacturing, SCM.  Create Project, Objects and promote them as per   Project Lifecycle.  Write ER, NER using FDA.  Write/Debug BSFN using Visual Studio.  Write/Modify Business services using   JDeveloper.  Create new applications and UBE using FDA and   RDA.  Create Orchestrations using JDE Orchestrator   Studio.  Create UDO objects like E1pages, Watchlist,   Notifications etc.  Support to maintain and improve the application   functionality.  Think creatively to solve the user problem with   holistic and simple solutions.  Drive best practices within teams with respect   to coding standards and guidelines.  Manage individual project priorities,   deadlines, and deliverables.  Build products aligned to help our clients   succeed in the industry.  Ability to learn and adapt to new   frameworks/technologies.  Ensure compliance with the documented software   processes and procedures throughout the life cycle.  Constantly review the code to ensure the   quality of the design by avoiding complexity, advocating clarity and to do   this with the team.  Contribute to each step of the product   development process from ideation to implementation to release.  Create software documentation and update   existing documentation Implement best practices, standards and procedures   including quality and delivery methodologies.     SKILLS & ABILITIES   1. Excellent organizational skills.  2. A team player but also able to work on own initiative.  3. Self-motivated and flexible.  4. Excellent communication skills both written and verbal.  5. Excellent attendance and punctuality record.  6. You follow agreed procedures and standards in your work and ensure you provide a safe and effective service to others.  7. You are honest and transparent and are not afraid to admit when you have made a mistake.   WORKPLACE VALUES   The job holder will be expected to operate in line with our workplace values which are: 1. To provide equal opportunities free from discrimination. 2. To practice honesty and humility in all areas and with our customers     WORKING CONDITIONS   WORK ENVIRONMENT Work from office   HOURS / SHIFTS 9 hours/ As per the product assigned   SALARY Directly proportional to the experience and As per company norms   BENEFITS Per Industry & Market Standards (Base + Performance Incentive Paid Quarterly) Standard Statutory Compliances (PF + Medical Ins + Gratuity + Paid Leave)   OTHER Team outing, Lunches,Outdoor games,Book Club, certifications opportunity

Conduct discovery meetings with customers by identifying the customers current process and future state needs. Configure application to meet customer needs as per the configuration request sheet. Evaluate and design integration methodology and documentation as per customers use case.Responsible for analysing and basic testing of integration methods. Create and manage project plans in cooperation with the customer's internal project manager. Participate in weekly customer project team meetings, maintaining an action items list. Educate the customer on technical requirements. Master and maintain detailed knowledge of RippleHire's product-suite configuration options. Provide best-practice guidance on customer processes. Create requirement and defect documents as per internal standards. Bring in additional consultants and technical resources as necessary. Hands-on technical experience in integrations/data migrations/product provisioning etc. Testing APIs using tools like Postman, SoapUI. Understanding of common web technologies, SaaS platform & architecture, Content Management systems and a working knowledge of HTML, XML, API, JavaScript, CSS, APIs (REST and SOAP), Authentication methods like Basic/OAuth2.0 etc. Strong understanding of software development methodologies, infrastructure architecture, and data management principles. alternatives assessment and develop strategic ways-to-play for the client to stay ahead of the curve                                   Lead right from process diagnostic and initial opportunity The Technical Consultant will focus in the following areas:       Customer      Interact with customers in a professional manner, demonstrating leadership and expertise when presenting solutions and status with the goal of projecting Provenir as a trusted advisor and subject matter expert.     Provide best-in-class, impartial, practical, and actionable enhancement recommendations and thought leadership to our clients     Nurture the client relationship to build long-term mutually beneficial relationships.         Business Domain Knowledge      Understands and can demonstrate business acumen, knowledge of use cases in a variety of domains (credit risk, fraud, AML).     Build and maintain relationships by making recommendations that engage business leaders, establish credibility, solve problems, build consensus, and achieve objectives.     Data Science risk modeling techniques         Technology      Understands integration of various technical platforms and APIs, uses industry best practices, rules, technology and/or products to align the priorities of IT with the business and provides the configured business solution to meet clients desired outcomes.     Configure or guide the client in their configuration of the Provenir Solution.         Analysis and design      Problem solve and develop approaches for challenging situations that address a unique client need.     Able to analyze and document customer requirements and produce high-level technical designs.     Participate in detailed data analysis that support our recommendations with fact.         Communication      Translate and present complex data to non-technical personnel internally and externally.     Collaborate with the client, internal Provenir teams and your colleagues to bring the best possible ideas forth for maximizing the business benefits of Provenir products.         Improvement Focus      Consider the effectiveness of existing processes and suggest improvements. Collaborate with peers to 'productize' solutions, enabling reuse of solutions across multiple customers.     Proactively participate in constantly improving Provenirs solutions by bringing "from the field" ideas and perspective.             Qualifications, Strengths and Skills       Experience-          3-6 years of experience working in retail banking/financial services company             Expertise in configuring Business Rule Engines such as PCSM, Blaze Advisor etc             Preferable experience gathering and translating customer requirements in SaaS               Education    - Bachelors/University degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering           Skills/Abilities         Proven ability to develop strong relationships with clients; manage full lifecycle of a project, while demonstrating a results-focused mindset.     Coding skills including JavaScript, SQL, scripted calculations, and algorithms (deploying as objects within a no code/low code development tool), html (for integration with UI) Knowledge of message queues: JMS (primarily MQSeries) Solution design and configuration: Sequence modelling, synchronous / asynchronous processes, micro services, batch processes, error handling, auditing     Database integration with JDBC (desirable) Implementing or working with BPM tools.     Knowledge of all phases of software development including requirements analysis, design, coding, testing (integration, user, and performance), debugging, implementation, and support     To perform XSLT transformations Visual configuration of data models, data mapping and data transformation.     To train clients on the Provenir software (and bespoke solution delivered to the client) and enabling clients to become independent in the development and evolution of the bespoke solution provided to them Provision of advice relating to technical aspects of an implementation regarding the Provenir platform and supporting technologies Release management / change management / IT governance best practices.     Deployment of analytical models: ideally with some understanding of R, SAS or Python models\ Understanding of IT compliance, data protection with KYC and AML regulation knowledge being desirable Qualifications,     Experience in project management methodologies such as Agile, SCRUM, Waterfall.     Excellent English oral and written communication skills, able to influence stakeholders.     Strong presentation and client facing expertise      Proficient with tools such as Excel, Visio, PowerPoint, Confluence, Jira etc.     Travel as necessary to support clients and projects globally
column11: JMS, SAS, Coding, Project management, Javascript, JDBC, HTML, XSLT, SQL, Python

column2: Job Purpose: As an Automation Consultant, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining various automation solutions connecting different systems and applications to improve the efficiency and productivity of business processes. You will work on challenging integration projects using tools like Jitterbit, Automation Anywhere, eBonding (Fusions flagship product) and other relevant technologies. Main Duties & Responsibilities: Analyze and document existing business processes to identify opportunities for automation. Design and develop custom automation solutions using various tools and technologies. Ensure data flows efficiently between systems, automating processes and reducing manual interventions. Utilize integration tools like Jitterbit, Automation Anywhere, eBonding or similar platforms to build and maintain integration workflows and APIs. Develop custom code or scripts as needed for complex integration scenarios. Implement and test automation solutions and provide training to users. Troubleshoot and resolve integration issues promptly. Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for integration processes, APIs, and workflows. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand integration requirements and deliver solutions. Monitor and maintain automation solutions to ensure they operate efficiently and effectively. Work with clients to identify new automation opportunities and continuously improve existing solutions. Guide Juniors and help the Sales team to present Demos and Proof of Concepts. Experience: - 4-6 years of experience working with Automation or Integration technologies. Expert knowledge of at least one of the below technologies: BMC TrueSight Orchestration BMC Artrium Orchestrator ServiceNow Orchestrator ServiceNow Automation Engine Jitterbit Automation Anywhere Skills: Experience with on-prem and cloud-based automation platforms like Jitterbit, BMC Truesight Orchestration, Ansible, MuleSoft, and Automation Anywhere. Experience with DevOps and Agile methodologies. Experience with developing complex integrations Experience with security best practices for automation solutions. Confident to lead the development and guide juniors. BMC Helix ITSM Knowledge will be preferable. Excellent verbal and written communication skills - ability to interact and communicate with customers to drive client value. A proven ability to develop positive working relationships in a distributed team and to create effective collaboration with direct and extended team members. Accountable for meeting project deliverable deadlines and taking ownership of the work. Proven ability to work in a pressurised development and customer environment. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Qualifications: Masters or Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.Role & responsibilities

Testing and Debugging: Conduct thorough testing of automation programs, identify and resolve issues, and debug system components to ensure proper functioning and adherence to project requirements. Continuous Improvement: Stay updated on the latest advancements in industrial automation technologies, identify opportunities for process optimization, and propose innovative solutions to enhance efficiency and productivity. column1: Dynamics CE / Dynamics CRM Technical Architect
column2: We enable financial institutions to become digital leaders.    As a professional team of global scale, we work with best clients for great and exciting projects, in an environment where we learn amazing things every day. Each code, each voice, each contribution, each challenge, each success is celebrated here. We welcome candidates who share our values, have the skills and are  passionate to enjoy our journey to build the digital future of finance, together. We are looking for Dynamics CE / Dynamics CRM Technical Architect with 10+ years of experience in assisting solution design, and implementation of Microsoft Dynamics CRM/ Dynamics 365 solution for Omni-Channel Banking applications such as internet banking, mobile banking, CRM and loan origination.  What you will be doing:  Apply the functional resources/business analysts with requirements gathering and provides design guidance for mid to large sized Dynamics 365 (CRM)/CE projects.  Provides leadership and technical guidance to the project team throughout the implementation to ensure accurate delivery of project plans.  Provides current best practices and solution alternatives as part of functional or technical design documents.  Advise pre-sales & technical teams on best practice architectures for internal and customer facing solutions. This can be a reactive response to a customer need or request for proposal and include participating in proof-of-concepts, making product demonstrations, presentations and preparing Dynamics 365 Online consumption estimates for the proposed solution architectures.  Understand customers overall data estate, IT and business priorities and success measures to design implementation architectures and solutions using advanced analytics and artificial intelligence  Mentoring and leading VeriPark project team members and customers to be proficient in delivering Online and On-Prem based solutions. This can also include identifying architectural problems in projects, providing solutions to these problems and participating in software development processes to help implementing new technologies.   Identify, build, drive programs and R&D studies to establish new technical practices and learn private or public preview cutting-edge technologies.  Documenting and sharing designs, technical best practices / insights with internal teams   Maintaining and advancing technical skills and knowledge, keeping up to date with technology trends and competitive insights on cloud and on-prem technologies.  Assisting solution design, and implementation of Microsoft Dynamics CRM/ Dynamics 365 solution. Responsible for application architecture and design decisions during a project. Works to map overall design to requirements and systems, ensuring solutions align with business goals and processes, and fit within the enterprise context. What we are looking for:  10+ years of experience in Microsoft Dynamics CRM/ Dynamics 365/Dynamics CE   Bachelor's Degree in IT, Computer Science  Professional certification in CRM or agree to achieve appropriate certification in agreed upon timeframe   Deep knowledge of Dynamics 365 for Sales, Field Service, Customer Service, Marketing, Portals, USD and other emerging Microsoft software.  Ability to design, configure and deploy Dynamics CRM solutions based on complex XRM solutions with multiple customizations, plugins and batch/real-time integrations.  Strong analytical and problem-solving skills that enable comprehension and resolution of complex business and technical issues  Enthusiastic team-player as well as a self-motivated  Innovative, open minded and proactive  Excellent English skills   What we are offering: Remote Freedom, Your Way:  At VeriPark we believe in the power of talent, no matter where it resides. Design your ideal workspace and achieve the perfect work-life balance. Performance-Linked Bonus:  Your hard work doesn't go unnoticed! Enjoy a performance-linked bonus as a testament to your dedication! Rewards Beyond the Job:  Enjoy a comprehensive benefits package, including Remote Work Support, Health Insurance, Care Program, and Online Psychological Support. We care you! Birthday Leave, Because You Matter:  We value your special moments! Take the day off on your birthday and treat yourself. Global Impact, Cutting-Edge Tech:  Immerse yourself in global projects with top-tier clients and stay ahead with cutting-edge technologies. Your skills will shape the future of our industry. Unleash Your Potential:  Develop yourself with VeriPark Academy opportunities; webinars, and in-house training sessions. Diverse, Vibrant Community:  Be part of a dynamic environment that values diversity and inclusivity. Together Culture:  Even in a remote world, we cultivate connections through engaging face-to-face gatherings as well as online fun events. Special information sharing environment where you can update & align yourself. Apply now and let's shape the future together. About VeriPark: We are a global technology company with more than two decades of expertise in the Financial Services industry. Our mission is to enable financial institutions to become digital leaders by delivering world class customer journeys in digital and assisted channels. We develop omni-channel delivery, customer engagement (CRM), branch automation and loan origination solutions based on Microsoft technology (Azure, Dynamics 365, Power Platform) for banks and insurance companies worldwide.  With offices in 15 countries from Canada over Europe and the Middle East to Kuala Lumpur, our 900+ colleagues are serving customers in more than 30 countries worldwide.      https://www.veripark.com
column11: Dynamics 365, Solution Architecting, MS Dynamics CRM, Dynamics Ce, CRM

column2: Job Title: SAP Basis & Hana Administrator Job Location: Bengaluru Job Exp: 8-9 years of experience as an SAP Basis & HANA Administrator administering SAP HANA and S/4 HANA landscapes. Job Requirements: Deep knowledge of SAP Basis tasks: technical planning, installations, and configurations (SAP S/4 HANA, FIORI, SLT, SOLMAN, SAP Router), upgrades, OS/DB migrations, Unicode conversions for SAP NetWeaver platform, SSO configuration, installation of SSL certificates. familiar with BRTOOLS for Space management. Hands on experience of implementation and conversion for S/4HANA solutions. Applying Support Package, Kernel patch upgrade, TMS configuration and Transport administration (Transport strategy), maintaining of operation modes and profile parameters, background job management.  Experience in SAP Backup and Recovery. Mastery of the HANA knowledge including High Availability and Disaster Recovery. Experience and deep knowledge of SAP system migration (DMO tool) and upgrades. Strong SQL scripting knowledge, creating Stored procedures, troubleshooting performance issue optimization of the code. Expertise with SLT Expertise with SAP Data Services Experience in SAP Sizing by using the SAP Quick sizer. Experience in SAP data Archiving. Integration of SAP HANA into different remote systems. Exposure to different remote access options in HANA system. Hardware, operating systems (LINUX) and networking connectivity required for the SAP environment. Deep knowledge of SAP HANA in-Memory Platform core technology, including architecture, landscape design, installation, upgrade, performance tuning and system integration. Elaboration of SAP release plan. Experience in system refresh tasks, Client copies (local client copy, client export, client import). Performance optimization and tuning: deep experience with SQL traces to achieve Performance Impact Analysis. Early Watch configuration and analysis. Transport Management. Automation of SAP basis tasks through different development and scripting approaches Incident Management: Troubleshooting the issues from OS level like work process monitoring, checking logs, checking OSS notes, provide Performance analysis and suggest solution to write the Root Cause Analysis. Write Operational procedures. Provide On-call support during weekday and weekends as per the schedule. Certification in SAP S/4 HANA and OS/DB Migration will be a plus.

column1: Oracle Cloud ERP - Technical Consultant (Gurgaon & Indore)
column2: I.   Job Summary This intermediate level position is part of a team responsible for the configuration and support of software applications (e.g. ERP Oracle Cloud, Blackline, OneStream, etc.) through strong business partnership, quality insights and exceptional customer service. As part of the Finance Support team, this role provides basic technical and analytical support delivering Finance processes. He/she will need to challenge existing solutions and lead the team in enhancing systems with an emphasis on user experience, simplification, automation, performance, and standardization. With experienced team members, may provide input for delivering Finance processes.   Interested candidates can share the resume directly on sraj5@wm.com II.   Essential Duties and Responsibilities   To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. Other duties may be assigned.  Monitors Finance systems, open cases and reviews current processes to troubleshoot application related issues and answers system related questions Responsible for supporting releases, upgrades, patches, and configuration across the assigned ERP Oracle Cloud module(s)/Finance application(s) including Lease Accelerator, OneStream, Hyperion, Blackline, Concur, Coupa, Kyriba, OneSource Seeks development on the job and through more formal training. Performs analysis and documents current and new processes to take advantage of technology Makes required configuration changes according to documented requirements. Advises on impacts to current configuration and downstream applications. Maintains foundational workforce structures, data fields and processes Analyzes impact of configuration of tables, data fields, foundational structures and processes on downstream systems and integrations Ensures data integrity and governance by supporting data imports and extracts and validating accuracy through reporting and queries. Supports integrations/file transfers With guidance, analyzes new software application products or new modules in existing applications Provides day to day support and maintenance for system(s), preparation for releases, upgrades and/or patches. Executes testing, reporting and analysis of changes. Monitors open tickets/vendor escalations for progress Experience with queries/extracts and reports and supporting integrations. Database queries/extracts using calculations, formulas, and complex commands(SQL and PL/SQL) Extensive experience evaluating requirements and specs for development, testing and deployment Experience in Developing BI Reports and OTBI reports Experience in performance tuning of Reports Experience in any of the integration tools Mulesoft,Matillion or OIC(Oracle Integration Cloud) Executes unit, integration and acceptance testing. Working with the functional team, provides screen shots and system steps for testing and change management May be responsible for configuring and delivering basic reports and queries utilizing delivered software. Follows established data governance Identify business requirements and map them to the system functionality Support the standardization of Finance policies, practices and processes creating a shared vision across SMEs.  Hands on configuration of application(s), and supporting releases, patches, upgrades and/or enhancements III.   Supervisory Responsibilities No supervisory duties.  IV. Qualifications The requirements listed below are representative of the qualifications necessary to perform the job. A. Education and Experience Education:  Bachelors Degree (accredited), or in lieu of degree, High School Diploma or GED (accredited) and 3 years of relevant work experience.  Experience:  5 - 7 years previous experience (in addition to education requirement)

Position:  Netsuite Technical Consultant  Location:  Remote Shift:  8:00 Pm to 5:00 Am (Night shift)  Minimum Experience:  5+ Years Kindly apply only if you can join in 0 - 10 Days & willing for a Remote Role with a Night Shift Job description: As a Senior NetSuite Technical Consultant you will be responsible for implementing high-impact custom integrations and advanced back-office solutions for our clients, as well as driving adoption of high standards and best practices within the NetSuite development team. You will be a valuable member of the Cloud Solutions NetSuite consulting team, and will be provided substantial opportunity for technical growth and professional development. This is a position for supporting our client in the United States. If you have a passion for helping growing companies achieve success, are looking for an opportunity to work with a fast paced, growing company, and like to be able to make an impact  this could be the role for you! Responsibilities: Design, develop, implement, test, deploy, troubleshoot and maintain custom solutions that enhance and integrate core business and management processes based on instruction from Technical Architects. These solutions include but are not limited to: SuiteScript solutions deployed within NetSuite Advanced PDFs/Custom PDF Solutions Integrations between NetSuite and external systems (point to point, or utilizing an appropriate middleware solution) Prepare detailed Design Specification Documents resulting from meetings with key business stakeholders, integration and business process automation delivery, and guidance from Technical Architects Communicate and present technical ideas, recommendations, solutions and issues to C-level executives, project team members and non-technical stakeholders Manage multiple development and project initiatives at one time, while effectively communicating utilization, roadblocks, and progress to technical leadership and prioritizing based on feedback Adhere to high-quality development principles while delivering solutions on-time and on-budget, and aiding other developers in doing the same. Responsible for executing in all phases of the NetSuite implementation cycle, including: Participate in business process design and user story sessions with clients to determine NetSuite system needs Implement and configure NetSuite to address business needs and processes Establish test cases and support User Acceptance Testing (UAT) with core client stakeholders to ensure system configuration objectives have been met Create training/support documentation, and drive end-user training to promote user adoption Support the Go Live deployment processes, ensuring a seamless software launch and continuity of business operations during this cutover Support the client following Go Live deployment to troubleshoot issues that arise, and promote additional methods to optimize the system for enhanced performance Work and communicate effectively with cross-functional team members Prioritize project workload to ensure milestones and objectives are attained Provide input as a consultant to clients on their requirements by utilizing industry experience, best practices, and a pragmatic mindset Requirements Qualifications: Required Fundamental understanding of SOAP and/or REST APIs and how to leverage these Familiarity with NetSuite SOAP and/or REST Web Services At least 3 years of NetSuite platform and development experience. Relevant platform and non-technical experience in line with years of NetSuite experience as expected, such as customizing forms, fields, records, roles, searches, reports, familiarity with standard business flows such as Order to Cash or Lead to Order, etc. Demonstrable experience with several of the main NetSuite script types Experience with Change Management and Version Control (Git or SVN) Strong verbal and written communication skills Preferred Experience with tools such as Celigo or Dell Boomi Understanding and practice of SDLC principles including requirements gathering, data analysis, design, development, testing, deployment and maintenance 4+ years of development using one or more of the following: JavaScript, Java, C#/.NET, PHP Database and SQL experience NetSuite Certified SuiteCloud Developer certification Experience working with Advanced PDFs Experience developing in and integrating data from enterprise cloud systems such as marketo, Magento, Shopify, Salesforce, Oracle on Demand, Microsoft Dynamics or Epicor

column2: Role & responsibilities     We are seeking a skilled Microsoft Dynamics 365 and Power Platform Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement (CE) and the Power Platform, with expertise in designing, developing, and implementing end-to-end solutions to meet business requirements. The candidate should possess excellent communication skills, the ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team, and a passion for staying updated with the latest advancements in the Dynamics 365 and Power Platform ecosystem. Key Responsibilities: Design,      develop, and implement custom solutions within the Microsoft Dynamics 365      CE environment, leveraging the Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate,      Power BI) as needed. Collaborate      with stakeholders to gather and analyze business requirements, and      translate them into technical specifications and solution designs. Develop      and customize Dynamics 365 CE entities, forms, views, workflows, and plugins      to meet business needs. Implement      integrations between Dynamics 365 CE and other systems using web services,      APIs, and middleware platforms. Provide      technical leadership and guidance to development teams, ensuring adherence      to best practices, coding standards, and project timelines. Conduct      code reviews, performance optimizations, and troubleshooting to ensure the      stability and scalability of Dynamics 365 CE solutions. Stay      updated with the latest developments in Dynamics 365 CE, Power Platform,      and related technologies, and recommend best practices and solutions to      enhance system capabilities. Collaborate      with cross-functional teams including business analysts, solution      architects, and quality assurance testers to deliver high-quality      solutions. Preferred candidate profile     Bachelors      degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology, or a      related field. Minimum of 4 years of hands-on experience with      Microsoft Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement (CE), including customization,      configuration, and development. Proficiency in building end-to-end solutions using the      Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI). Strong      technical skills in .NET framework, C#, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and related      web technologies. Experience      with customizations and extensions within Dynamics 365 CE, including      entity model customization, form scripting, workflow automation, and      plugin development. Knowledge      of data integration techniques and tools, such as Azure Data Factory,      Azure Logic Apps, or SSIS. Excellent      analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate      complex business requirements into technical solutions. Strong      communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively      communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Microsoft      certifications in Dynamics 365 CE and Power Platform are a plus. Location- PAN India Wipro locations (Bangalore, Hyderabad, Chennai, Gurgaon, Greater Noida, Pune, Kolkata, Mumbai) Notice- Immediate to 30 days Perks and benefits   Best of industry standard

column2: An exciting opportunity to work at the Information & Digital Engineering organization in Shell IT.  We are looking for a talented  Technical Consultant  with great interpersonal skills to join our team. Shell''''s business has been built on a foundation of innovative technology and skilled people.  Your growth is our future in Information & Digital Engineering. Information technology supports all aspects of our businesses and we have some of the world''''s most complex problems to solve.  You will not only get an opportunity to work with the latest technology, but with the scale of Shell, you will also get the opportunity to shape future digital technology working with the biggest players in the technology industry.  With open source a key tenet of our technology choices, you will also get the opportunity to contribute back to the software community. The diversity of positions on offer are bound to help you grow in your career. Working with other computer scientists and software engineers in Shell, Information & Digital Engineering offers a unique opportunity for you to make an impact across a complex integrated energy value chain serving all lines of business in the Group.  You could be creating new customer services in the largest Lubricants business globally, or innovating ways to grow an Aviation business which refuels five aircrafts every minute. With Shell investing significantly in renewables, there will be several opportunities to power our green engine too. Technical Consultant  is an individual with  proven experience in leading by example in adherence to software engineering best practices , delivering software products/applications generating business value.  They are expected to be  a community leader  and have continuous improvement mindset, driving value-based process, product/application optimization and technology roadmap. Key Accountabilities: Solution consultation and development in accordance with the enterprise technology principles, methods, standards, and practices. Estimation, solution design, detailed technical design, application technical deliverables including code, associated tests and documentation. Contribution to functional excellence in terms of definition and maintenance of standards, methods and tools, bringing in best practices from market standard implementations. Manage complex integration scenarios and interfaces between on-premise solutions, cloud and legacy systems. Skills & Requirements: 12+ Years relevant software development experience broadly ranging from front-end, back-end, cloud automation and orchestration  with depth across the stack . column2: Job Title: Senior Salesforce Administrator     Job Description: We are looking for a seasoned Salesforce Administrator with a minimum of 6 years of experience in Salesforce administration and configuration. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of Salesforce best practices and a proven track record of implementing and optimizing Salesforce solutions to meet business requirements. Responsibilities: Manage and administer Salesforce platform, including user management, security settings, profiles, roles, permissions, workflows, and process automation. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design solutions, and implement customizations and enhancements in Salesforce. Configure and customize Salesforce objects, fields, page layouts, record types, and validation rules to support business processes. Develop and maintain Salesforce reports and dashboards to provide actionable insights and drive data-driven decision-making. Manage and maintain integrations between Salesforce and other systems, including data imports/exports, API integrations, and middleware platforms. Stay current on Salesforce releases, features, and best practices, and proactively identify opportunities to leverage new functionality to improve business processes. Provide training and support to end users on Salesforce functionality and best practices. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Technology, or related field. Salesforce Administrator certification (ADM 201) is required; additional certifications such as Advanced Administrator (ADM 211) or Platform App Builder are preferred. Minimum of 6 years of experience as a Salesforce Administrator, with demonstrated proficiency in Salesforce configuration, customization, and administration. Strong understanding of Salesforce architecture, data model, and security model. Experience with Salesforce Lightning Experience and Salesforce Lightning Web Components preferred. Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot and resolve issues independently. Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple priorities simultaneously.   Perks and Benefits  -  All Employees Benefits are here. Onsite opportunity. Work from home.

column1: Senior Engineer - IT Operation SAP Basis
column2: Avantor is looking for a dynamic, forward-thinking, and experienced Senior Engineer IT Operation SAP Basis to deliver defined Service Line Agreements (SLA) of his/her role and assist leadership team in managing the lean culture of the organization and create global impact through change projects that drive automation, standardization, digitization, and analytics. The position reports to Senior Manager of ServiceDesk, the Senior Engineer SAP Basis Operations is responsible for configuring, monitoring, and optimizing Avantors SAP environments. You will work closely with the SAP Basis, developers, and application teams to support multi-billion-dollar business applications. Our top priority is preventing service disruption while enabling fast growth of our life sciences company. You will also have the opportunity to cross train and support various SAP products, ancillary systems, databases, and related technologies while proactively contributing to strategic SAP projects. Key success factors will include a positive attitude and the ability to work independently as well as within teams. As part of this well-respected IT group, you will enjoy a wide variety of self-directed work within a supportive team environment. The team: This staffing is required to provide around the clock coverage for monitoring and response given our global organization. This staffing is also required for significant coverage requirements during the weekend change implementation windows. What were looking for:  Education: Bachelors degree in computer science or related field, or equivalent education/experience Experience:  o 5+ years experience in SAP Basis administration in S/4HANA or ECC 6.0, Solman 7.2 and several other NetWeaver 7.5+ applications with ABAP/Java stacks such as BW, PI, CRM, SCM, EWM, GRC, SAP Gateway, BODS, C4C, FSM, CFIN, MDG and Web Dispatcher is required. o Experience in database administration, implementation and troubleshooting is required. o Experience with Linux/Windows OS and HANA, ASE and/or MaxDB databases is required. o Experience with Solution Manager 7.2, cloud solutions, and HANA Cockpit is highly desired. o Certified with ITIL 4 Foundation will be an added advantage.  Qualifications: o Expert in SAP BASIS and underlying operating systems and databases mentioned above. o Able to debug and understand basic programming. o Proficiency with Microsoft Office products o Ability to work under pressure to meet deadlines, both independently and as a team member o Must be flexible with work hours including weekends in order to support system maintenance and other off hour activities. o Must possess excellent problem-solving skills and written/oral communication skills. o Ability to communicate clearly and professionally with personnel at all levels. o Good time management skills with ability to remain organized and focused in a highly volatile environment. o Self-motivated and flexibility required. o Commitment to high professional and ethical standards in a diverse workplace required. o Ability to take ownership of tasks, initiatives, and focus areas and drive consistent progress with positive results. o Desire to focus on and please the customer, ability to understand requests from the customers point of view highly desired. How you will thrive and create an impact:  o As a member of the IT Operations group, reporting to the Sr Manager of ServiceDesk, the Senior Engineer SAP Basis Operations is responsible for configuring, monitoring, and optimizing Avantors SAP environments. You will work closely with the SAP Basis, developers, and application teams to support multi-billion-dollar business applications. o participate in the research and analysis of system application needs and problem solving. Provide assistance, advice, problem solving, and technical information to customers regarding the use of software applications. Act as liaison with customers regarding the status of their requests. Exercise responsibility for the coordination and application of established procedures related to information systems operations and for ensuring the accuracy and timeliness of system output, assuring that generated output meets the needs of assigned customers.

column2: Company Description ConnectWise is a software platform designed for technology solutions providers (TSPs) to run their entire as-a-service business. With a robust suite of products, including business management, remote monitoring and management, remote control and access, quote and proposal automation, and cybersecurity risk assessments, ConnectWise empowers TSPs to succeed in the IT industry. Our company values diversity and cultivates a positive and inclusive culture where every colleague is valued for their unique contributions. Role Description This is a full-time hybrid role for a Senior Software Engineer at ConnectWise. The Senior Software Engineer will be responsible for developing and maintaining back-end web applications and software solutions. They will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, code, test, and debug software functionality. This role will be based out of Pune Candidates willing to relocate can apply. Work Location : Pune only. Candidate ready to relocate can also apply for this role. Work Type: Hybrid Twice a week from Pune Hinjewadi office is mandatory. Experience: 5 Years to 9 Years in .net development CTC: Best in the Industry. We are organizing a .Net virtual drive on Friday 17th May 24. Please forward your updated profile if you are interested in the opportunity. Required Skill.  Programming languages: o ASP.net, .NET core, C#, JavaScript, SQL, MVC, Web API, o Experience with Intellij / Eclipse, Visual Studio and Git Source Control o Experience with HTML, CSS, Javascript Experience with React  Strong computer skills as well as excellent verbal and written communication skill.  Organized, detail-oriented, self-motivated, and willing to develop professional  Strong team player, ability to build positive and collaborative relationships within the organization  Ability to work on multiple priorities and/or projects simultaneously  Problem solving abilities and the ability to meet reasonable deadlines.  Ability to work under general supervision  Ability to understand complex algorithm Roles & Responsibility  5+ years of Designs, modifies, develops, writes and implements software programming applications.  Coding and debugging software's.  Participates in the testing process through test review and analysis, test witnessing and certification of software  Meet with stakeholders to define project scope.  Oversee projects completely, from requirements document to delivery. This includes o Reviewing user stories Creating acceptance criteria o Coordinating with project manager to maintain project visibility and completion estimates Managing change control.  Fix customer issues at code level and release to product  Support, and/or installs software applications  Diagnoses issues in software applications and environments  Interacts with colleagues and/or partners through a variety of mediums to provide support and understand needs  Document partner interaction, troubleshooting, and results in a clear and concise man  Relies on limited experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals.  A certain degree of creativity and latitude is required. About company ConnectWise is an IT software platform built by the innovation of several minds passionate and committed to helping technology solution providers (TSPs) realize their success in todays ever-evolving marketplace. Everything we do is tailored toward enabling customer success. Thats why we call them partners and not just customers. ConnectWise is the longest-running, market-leading software platform for technology solution providers (TSPs). The ConnectWise platform is used by more TSPs (35,000) around the world than any other software platform. So, in a way, you could say we help keep the IT world spinning. We have 2,600 colleagues. Founded in 1982, we are a 38-year-old well-established product company headquartered in Tampa and located in 14 centers across the globe. We are seeking talented colleagues to travel with us on our exciting journey ahead! For more details, please go through the below link https://www.connectwise.com/company/about-us Company Info Link:ConnectWise website Address: 8th Floor, Wing B,, Unit Nos. I and 2 Times Square,, Marol, Andhcri Kurla Road Andheri East,, Mumbai Suburban, Maharashtra, MUMBAI, Maharashtra, India

column2: Overview Come and join us!  Do you want to advance your career with the worlds first cloud company? Since 1998, Oracle NetSuite has been on a mission to deliver an agile, unified application suite that gives leaders a complete view into their business. Our team is growing, and were looking for people like you to help us make a global impact. As the leading cloud business system, NetSuite includes financials, inventory management, HR, professional services automation, commerce, and more. Tens of thousands of customers all over the world trust NetSuite to give their businesses the visibility, agility, and control needed to make data-informed decisions quickly.  NetSuite is a place where you can build your career and have fun while doing so! Were invested in our people, our customers, and the community. As part of Oracle, our benefits are second to none. Joining our passionate team means that youre ready to take your career to the next level. With priceless learning opportunities, strong support, incredible innovation, and volunteer opportunities, NetSuite is committed to creating a workplace where everyone feels empowered and set up for success. Summary: The Shared Services Group within Oracle NetSuite Professional Services is chartered to assist and guide our customers by developing analytic reporting strategies and solutions, creating implementation roadmaps, performing assessments, and full-life cycle implementations of analytics solutions. We are looking for an experienced consultant/developer with significant hands-on experience working with NetSuite SuiteAnalytics Connect, integration, ETL and data warehouse solutions to assist Oracle NetSuite?? clients with their data warehouse implementation. Knowledge of related solutions such as Oracle Analytics Cloud (OAC) and NetSuite SuiteAnalytics Connect, and Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW) and Oracle Fusion Analytics Warehouse (FAW) desired. Key Responsibilities: Consultatively gathering      customer requirements and collaborate with the customer to define the      business challenge the customer is attempting to better understand with      data Taking the defined      business objective, using the understanding of the data model and      producing analytics to deliver actionable insights Identify new data and      product patterns through data mining and communicate those complex      concepts and the results of the analyses in a clear and effective manner      through creative visualization directly to company executives Extend the data warehouse      by incorporating data from 3rd party datasets/applications Build data pipelines from      multiple data sources by performing necessary ETL tasks including      processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for      analysis Lead project delivery as a      technical expert when implementing solutions. Develop solutions that      follow product development guidelines and are in-line with established      design standards and approved architectures. Transfer product knowledge      to customers to reinforce training and ensure adoption. Resolve or advance client      issues as appropriate to support and engineering teams. Develop and maintain      up-to-date knowledge of Oracle and NetSuite analytics, data integration      products and service offerings. Work closely with the      NetSuite Product Team to influence design, product features and roadmap. Attend internal meetings      and collaborate by sharing knowledge and standard methodologies within the      practice including mentoring sessions for junior resources, and other      central initiatives. Support pre-sales efforts      and drive technology adoption by positioning Oracle NetSuite Consulting      services. Preferred Qualifications/Skills include: At least 8 to 10 years of      experience in OBIEE/Hyperion/Oracle Analytics Cloud, Data Warehouse, and      SQL experience ideally with integration to/from Oracle NetSuite      Application Solid understanding of      Oracle Database, Data Modelling, Oracle SQL Developer, Data Warehouse      concepts, advanced analytics concepts, and implementation. Experience implementing      and using Big Data and visualization techniques, tools, and technologies      (Spark, Kafka, Tableau, etc.) Experience querying      databases and using statistical computer languages: R, Python, SLQ, etc. Experience with following      Oracle solutions is greatly desired: Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW),      Oracle Analytics Cloud (OAC), NetSuite SuiteAnalytics Connect, Oracle      Fusion Analytics Warehouse (FAW), JDBC/ODBC, ADO.net  Able to perform complex      problem solving and to work closely with NetSuite Support and Product      Management Experience with one or      more of the following business applications: NetSuite, SAP, Siebel,      Oracle, QuickBooks, Great Plains, Salesforce.com, MAS 90, PeopleSoft, JD      Edwards Experience in data design,      data modeling, data mapping, data interrogation, data quality, and master      data management is desired Good interpersonal and      communication skills Experience architecting      and provisioning/configuring cloud-based data warehouse and/or database      solutions is desired Travel Modest to moderate, as     appropriate.  Timings NA shift6PM to 3AM IST If this sounds like you, we hope to meet you! Life at Oracle and Equal Opportunity An Oracle career can span industries, roles, Countries and cultures, giving you the opportunity to flourish in new roles and innovate, while blending work life in. Oracle has thrived through 40+ years of change by innovating and operating with integrity while delivering for the top companies in almost every industry. In order to nurture the talent that makes this happen, we are committed to an inclusive culture that celebrates and values diverse insights and perspectives, a workforce that inspires thought leadership and innovation. Oracle offers a highly competitive suite of Employee Benefits designed on the principles of parity, consistency, and affordability. The overall package includes certain core elements such as Medical, Life Insurance, access to Retirement Planning, and much more. We also encourage our employees to engage in the culture of giving back to the communities where we live and do business. At Oracle, we believe that innovation starts with diversity and inclusion and to create the future we need talent from various backgrounds, perspectives, and abilities. We ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to successfully participate in the job application, interview process, and in potential roles to perform crucial job functions. That?? why we??e committed to creating a workforce where all individuals can do their best work. It?? when everyone?? voice is heard and valued that we??e inspired to go beyond what?? been done before. Disclaimer:  Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer*. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans??status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law. Which includes being a      United States Affirmative Action Employer https://www.oracle.com/corporate/careers/diversity-inclusion/

column2: Role & responsibilities     Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications for ServiceNow ITOM and CMDB solutions. Design, develop, and configure ServiceNow ITOM and CMDB modules, including Discovery, Service Mapping, and Configuration Management. Customize ServiceNow workflows, business rules, UI policies, and notifications to support ITOM and CMDB processes and automation. Configure and maintain the CMDB data model as per CSDM framework, ensuring accurate and up-to-date configuration item (CI) information. Integrate ServiceNow with other internal and external data sources. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement ITOM and CMDB good practices, ensuring alignment with industry standards and ITIL processes. Conduct thorough testing of ServiceNow configurations and customizations to ensure high-quality deliverables. Provide ongoing support and maintenance for ServiceNow applications, troubleshooting issues and implementing necessary fixes or enhancements. Stay updated with the latest ServiceNow releases and ITOM/CMDB-specific features, proactively identifying opportunities for process improvement and system optimization. Collaborate with other developers, administrators, and business analysts to deliver integrated solutions that meet the ITOM and CMDB needs of the organization. Document technical specifications, user guides, and standard operating procedures for ServiceNow applications and configurations. Provide leadership and guidance to junior consultants and project teams, fostering a collaborative and high-performance work environment.  Conduct training sessions and knowledge transfer activities to enable internal and customer teams to effectively use and maintain the implemented solutions.  Preferred candidate profile     Bachelors degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field. 7-10 years of experience as a ServiceNow Developer, with a focus on ITOM and CMDB. Strong expertise in ServiceNow ITOM and CMDB modules, including Discovery, Service Mapping, and Configuration Management. Proficient in ServiceNow development and configuration, including workflows, business rules, UI policies, and scripting using JavaScript. Experience with ServiceNow integrations. Familiarity with ITIL processes and best practices related to ITOM and CMDB. Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot technical issues independently. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with stakeholders and technical teams. ServiceNow certifications such as Certified System Administrator (CSA) and Certified Implementation Specialist (CIS) in ITOM or CMDB are highly desirable. Experience with Agile development methodologies is a plus.
