column2: We are seeking a skilled and experienced ServiceNow ITOM and CMDB Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in ServiceNow platform development and configuration, with a specific focus on IT Operations Management (ITOM) and Configuration Management Database (CMDB) solutions. As a ServiceNow ITOM and CMDB Developer, you will collaborate with internal and customer stakeholders to design, develop, and implement ServiceNow applications to support ITOM and CMDB processes within our organization. Role & responsibilities   Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications for ServiceNow ITOM and CMDB solutions. Design, develop, and configure ServiceNow ITOM and CMDB modules, including Discovery, Service Mapping, and Configuration Management. Customize ServiceNow workflows, business rules, UI policies, and notifications to support ITOM and CMDB processes and automation. Configure and maintain the CMDB data model as per CSDM framework, ensuring accurate and up-to-date configuration item (CI) information. Integrate ServiceNow with other internal and external data sources. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement ITOM and CMDB good practices, ensuring alignment with industry standards and ITIL processes. Conduct thorough testing of ServiceNow configurations and customizations to ensure high-quality deliverables. Provide ongoing support and maintenance for ServiceNow applications, troubleshooting issues and implementing necessary fixes or enhancements. Stay updated with the latest ServiceNow releases and ITOM/CMDB-specific features, proactively identifying opportunities for process improvement and system optimization. Collaborate with other developers, administrators, and business analysts to deliver integrated solutions that meet the ITOM and CMDB needs of the organization. Document technical specifications, user guides, and standard operating procedures for ServiceNow applications and configurations. Provide leadership and guidance to junior consultants and project teams, fostering a collaborative and high-performance work environment.
column11: CMDB, Discoverer, Itom

column2: Job title:  Oracle Technical Analyst - EBS Finance Location:  Bangalore / Hyderabad Description: As a Technical analyst, you will be the technical interface to customers, Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) and Value-Added Resellers (VARs) for resolution of problems related to the installation, recommended maintenance, and use of Oracle products. Understand all Oracle products in their competencies and in-depth knowledge of several products and/or platforms. Also, you should be highly experienced in multiple platforms and be able to complete assigned duties with minimal direction from management. In this position, you will routinely act independently while researching and developing solutions to customer issues. Job description: Looking for Consultant/Support Engineer/Application analyst with background in Financials and SQL. Skills nice to have: Unix, PL/SQL/Java/XML. The role is 60% in delivering technical and functional support to global enterprise customers where the difference is for projects work in creating automation, creating troubleshooting content, testing new releases, delivering trainings, and creating special internal tools. Team spirit is highly required, and we are doing periodic team events. Responsibilities : EBS Financials Technical Support Engineer is having the following responsibilities: Deliver customer service within service-level agreement for both quality and time Create valuable and reusable troubleshooting content Participate in Automation troubleshooting activities by providing feedback, submitting ideas, and creating scripts to depict and resolve software and data issues Engage in global or regional project activities for improving customer service and troubleshooting methodologies and tools Be part in testing cycles when preparing to release a new software version Occasionally deliver internal and external training sessions for financial software features and troubleshooting methods Be part of rotational support coverage for our customers on public holidays & weekends as per business needs. Ability to work an adjusted workweek to ensure we have coverage for our customers on weekends as per business needs. Example workweek could include potentially working from Tuesday through Sat or Wednesday through Sunday. Ability to participate in rotational support coverage for our customers on public holidays & weekends as per business needs. Ability to work shifts outside of standard business hours Qualifications: Knowledge of accounting principles and understanding of ERP product(s), particularly the Financials (General Ledger, Payables, Receivables) aspects are essential Knowledge of SQL(any DB) is essential also for support engineers Excellent communication skills (written and verbal) in English is mandatory Good knowledge of business flow for technical candidates Candidate should have strong customer focus, analytical thinking, to constantly look for ideas and process or tools improvement and to be team player Nice to have technical knowledge PL/SQL, Oracle Reports, XML Publisher, JAVA technology, Unix, APEX Past experience in desk support for ERPs or Consultancy would be an advantage Experience in Oracle E-Business Suite in particular Financials would be an advantage Job duties are varied and complex utilizing independent judgment. May have project lead role. 4 years experience with Core products or five years experience with Applications products and have a technical degree i.e., BS Computer Science/Management Information Systems/Science/ Engineering/Math/Physics/Chemistry with a 3.0 GPA OR (for Applications) proven professional/ technical experience, i.e., demonstrating an understanding of Applications at a functional and technical level (preferably Oracle)

column2: Microsoft Dynamics CRM (Customer Relationship Management) is a robust platform for managing customer relationships and interactions. As a technical professional in this domain, you'd be responsible for implementing, customizing, and maintaining Dynamics CRM solutions to meet the specific needs of businesses. Your role might involve: Customization and Configuration: Tailoring Dynamics CRM to align with business processes by customizing entities, fields, forms, views, workflows, and business rules. Integration: Integrating Dynamics CRM with other systems such as ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning), marketing automation, or custom applications to ensure seamless data flow and automation. Development: Writing custom code using .NET, JavaScript, or other programming languages to extend Dynamics CRM functionality, such as developing plugins, custom workflow activities, or web resources. Data Management: Managing data within Dynamics CRM, including data migration, data cleansing, and ensuring data integrity and security. Reporting and Analytics: Creating reports and dashboards using tools like Power BI to provide insights into sales, marketing, and customer service metrics. Deployment and Administration: Deploying Dynamics CRM instances, managing user access and security roles, and performing regular maintenance tasks such as updates and backups. Training and Support: Providing training and support to end-users to ensure they can effectively use Dynamics CRM to achieve their goals. Solution Design: Collaborating with stakeholders to gather requirements and design solutions that leverage Dynamics CRM to address business challenges and drive value. Upgrades and Migration: Managing upgrades to newer versions of Dynamics CRM and assisting with migrating solutions from older versions or other CRM systems to Dynamics CRM. Performance Optimization: Identifying and resolving performance issues within Dynamics CRM to ensure optimal system performance and user experience.
column11: MS Dynamics CRM, ERP, Configuration, Dynamics CRM, JavaScript, Data Management, .NET, marketing automation

column2: SAP CPQ Developer Job description Top 3 Skills: SAP Callidus CPQ IronPython Java Scripting Tasks 1. Collaborate with business stakeholders, sales teams, and IT colleagues to gather requirements, understand business processes, and define solution architecture for SAP CPQ implementation. 2. Design and develop SAP CPQ solutions, including product configuration rules, pricing models, quotation templates, workflows, and approval processes to meet business needs and enhance sales productivity. 3. Customize and configure SAP CPQ application modules, user interfaces, and data models to support complex product configurations, pricing rules, discounting policies, and bundling strategies. 4. Integrate SAP CPQ with other enterprise systems, including SAP ERP, CRM, e-commerce platforms, and third-party applications, using APIs, web services, middleware, and integration tools. 5. Perform system configuration, testing, debugging, and troubleshooting of SAP CPQ solutions to ensure functionality, performance, and data integrity across various environments (development, testing, production). 6. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including sales operations, marketing, finance, and IT support, to identify opportunities for process improvements, automation, and optimization of the quote-to-cash lifecycle. 7. Provide technical guidance, support, and training to end users, administrators, and business stakeholders on SAP CPQ functionality, best practices, and system capabilities. 8. Conduct system upgrades, patches, and enhancements for SAP CPQ applications, ensuring compatibility with underlying infrastructure, software dependencies, and regulatory requirements. 9. Monitor system performance, usage metrics, and user feedback to identify areas for enhancement, scalability improvements, and proactive maintenance of SAP CPQ solutions.

column2: Job Title: SAP BTP Developer/Consultant/Architect Experience: 5 + Years Location: Hyderabad (Pan India) Job Description: Job Summary: As an SAP BTP professional, you will play a crucial role in leveraging SAP's Business Technology Platform to enable digital transformation, enhance business processes, and provide innovative solutions for our organization. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing SAP BTP applications and services that align with the company's strategic objectives.     Key Responsibilities: SAP BTP Application Development: Develop, customize, and maintain SAP BTP applications and solutions to meet business requirements. This includes working on Cloud Foundry, Integration Suite, and other SAP BTP services. Integration and Connectivity: Design and implement integrations between SAP BTP and various SAP and non-SAP systems to ensure seamless data flow and process automation. Custom Application Development: Create custom applications using SAP BTP tools like SAP Cloud Application Programming Model, SAPUI5, and other relevant technologies. Security and Compliance: Ensure that SAP BTP solutions are developed and maintained in compliance with security standards and data protection regulations. Implement and maintain necessary security measures. Requirements Analysis: Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather and analyze their requirements and translate them into SAP BTP solutions. Solution Architecture: Design and document SAP BTP solution architectures, ensuring they are scalable, maintainable, and aligned with best practices. Technical Support and Troubleshooting: Provide technical support and resolve issues related to SAP BTP applications and services, including debugging and problem-solving. Performance Optimization: Monitor and optimize the performance of SAP BTP applications, ensuring efficient resource utilization and responsiveness. Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation for SAP BTP solutions, including technical specifications, design documents, and user guides. Training and Knowledge Sharing: Conduct training sessions for end-users and share knowledge with team members to promote best practices in SAP BTP development. Continuous Learning: Stay up to date with the latest SAP BTP technologies, trends, and best practices to ensure the organization's solutions remain current and competitive.     Qualifications: Bachelors / masters degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field. Experience with SAP BTP, Cloud Foundry, and SAP Integration Suite. Proficiency in relevant programming languages (e.g., JavaScript, Java, Python) and development tools. Strong knowledge of SAP Cloud Application Programming Model, SAPUI5, and SAP Fiori. Experience with SAP HANA and database modeling. Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. SAP certification in relevant areas is a plus.

column2: Microsoft Dynamics CRM (Customer Relationship Management) is a robust platform for managing customer relationships and interactions. As a technical professional in this domain, you'd be responsible for implementing, customizing, and maintaining Dynamics CRM solutions to meet the specific needs of businesses. Your role might involve: Customization and Configuration: Tailoring Dynamics CRM to align with business processes by customizing entities, fields, forms, views, workflows, and business rules. Integration: Integrating Dynamics CRM with other systems such as ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning), marketing automation, or custom applications to ensure seamless data flow and automation. Development: Writing custom code using .NET, JavaScript, or other programming languages to extend Dynamics CRM functionality, such as developing plugins, custom workflow activities, or web resources. Data Management: Managing data within Dynamics CRM, including data migration, data cleansing, and ensuring data integrity and security. Reporting and Analytics: Creating reports and dashboards using tools like Power BI to provide insights into sales, marketing, and customer service metrics. Deployment and Administration: Deploying Dynamics CRM instances, managing user access and security roles, and performing regular maintenance tasks such as updates and backups. Training and Support: Providing training and support to end-users to ensure they can effectively use Dynamics CRM to achieve their goals. Solution Design: Collaborating with stakeholders to gather requirements and design solutions that leverage Dynamics CRM to address business challenges and drive value. Upgrades and Migration: Managing upgrades to newer versions of Dynamics CRM and assisting with migrating solutions from older versions or other CRM systems to Dynamics CRM. Performance Optimization: Identifying and resolving performance issues within Dynamics CRM to ensure optimal system performance and user experience.
column11: MS Dynamics CRM, ERP, Configuration, Dynamics CRM, JavaScript, Data Management, .NET, marketing automation

column2: You will be part of a dedicated team with the intrinsic motivation of delivering the best-in-class partner ennoblement and support experience to our Dynamics Partners and Customers. The technical consultant will have the opportunity to actively contribute to product development initiatives while ensuring seamless integration and deployment of solutions across our partner ecosystem. Strong team player and high customer & commercial orientation with a pro-active attitude. Ability to work with international partners / customers. column2: Job Description: Oracle Apps DBA Company:  Birlasoft Location:   Pune, Position Type:  Full-time About Birlasoft:  Birlasoft is a leading global information technology services provider, delivering innovative business solutions to its clients. With a focus on digital transformation, Birlasoft helps businesses across industries navigate the complexities of today's rapidly changing technological landscape. Role Overview:  We are seeking a skilled Oracle Apps DBA to join our dynamic team. As an Oracle Apps DBA at Birlasoft, you will be responsible for managing and maintaining Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS) environments, particularly version R12, ensuring optimal performance, availability, and security. Key Responsibilities: Install, configure, upgrade, and patch Oracle EBS instances across various environments. Perform ongoing monitoring and tuning of Oracle EBS components to ensure high performance and reliability. Implement and maintain backup and recovery strategies for Oracle EBS databases. Manage users, roles, and security policies within the Oracle EBS environment. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Oracle EBS applications, databases, and associated technologies. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to support project deployments, migrations, and upgrades. Stay current with Oracle EBS technology advancements and best practices, and recommend improvements as needed. Participate in on-call rotations and provide off-hours support when necessary. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. Proven experience as an Oracle Apps DBA, with a focus on Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS) version R12. In-depth knowledge of Oracle database administration, including Oracle RDBMS, RAC, Data Guard, and Oracle Enterprise Manager. Experience with Oracle EBS installation, configuration, and maintenance in a multi-tier architecture. Proficiency in troubleshooting and resolving performance, connectivity, and functional issues within Oracle EBS environments. Strong understanding of Oracle EBS architecture, modules, and integrations. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Relevant Oracle certifications (e.g., Oracle Certified Professional) are a plus. Location:  This position is available for Pune location only. How to Apply:  Interested candidates are encouraged to submit their resumes to [Pranav.sardana@birlasoft.com]. Join Birlasoft and become part of a dynamic team that is driving digital transformation for businesses worldwide!
column11: Oracle Apps Dba, WebLogic, EBS

column1: Oracle - EBS Functional and Technical Consultant
column2: You will    have the primary responsibility of developing and supporting our clients having Oracle E-Business applications and should be skilled in both functional and technical aspects of Oracle ERP R12.          The Oracle techno functional analyst will be working closely with the client project team and business users to analyse, design, develop, test, document, and support business solutions toward meeting business requirements and objectives.          Business solutions include: Reporting, Interfaces,      Customisation     , Extensions, and 3rd party applications integrated with Oracle s E-Business applications. Should be able to collaborate with client team members, Developers, DBA and Functional Analyst and Business Users.          Should have a good understanding of functional modules and will be able to drive conversations around migrations, upgrades and implementations from a functional standpoint.            What will you be doing           Programming support of the client s Oracle E-Business R12 environment - Oracle Reports, Forms, BI-Publisher reports, database procedures, triggers and Linux shell scripts.     Maintain a current suite of custom objects as well as scope and build new ones based on business requirements.     Delivers architecture design, coding, development, and production support of Oracle EBS applications and databases.     Module familiarisation needed on any of the following: AP , AR , GL , FA , PO , OM , SCM , ManufacturingAdapts to existing EBS modules and implements new functionalities as required to accommodate organisational changes or internal client needs.     Provides daily technical user support for applications including the diagnosing and solving of technical issues and providing regular data maintenance.     Review and understand business requirements, recommend solutions and provide level of effort estimates to complete customizations or configurations to the application.     Translate business requirements into technical specifications.     Ensure program code is written according to documented software development processes and standards based on client documentation and change management practices.     Develop efficient and effective test plans.     Use technical and functional knowledge of Oracle ERP to identify and solve problems.     Lead functional requirements gathering exercises and come up with a roadmap for migrations, upgrades and new implementations.     Work with third party tax and other analytical and payment processing solutions integrated with Oracle EBS           What do you get in return           Love your career:    Competitive total rewards package with excellent take home salaries, shifted work time bonus, sign on bonus and an annual corporate bonus plan!       Love your development   : Hone your skills or learn new ones with a minimum 0.6 Lakh INR* annual training allowance; 2 paid professional development days, attend conferences, become certified, whatever you like!       Love your work/life balance:    3 weeks of paid time off and flexible working hours. Our new Hyderabad and office opens in June until then work fully remotely from your home, all you need is a stable internet connection!       Love your workspace:    Hybrid working, we give you all the equipment you need to work from home and the office including a laptop with your choice of OS, with 0.3 lakh INR* budget to personalise your work environment!        Love your community:    Blog during work hours; take a day off and volunteer for your favorite charity. To support in keeping our people, their families and their communities safe, Pythian is covering the cost of the Covid 19 Vaccine for all eligible employees in India

column2: We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Senior SAP Consultant with a strong background in S/4HANA CDS (Core Data Services), ABAP programming, Fiori development, and exposure to SAP BW (Business Warehouse)      The ideal candidate will play a pivotal role in guiding our clients through the implementation, customization, and optimization of SAP solutions to meet their business requirements              What we are looking for:          S/4HANA CDS Development:          Design, develop, and implement Core Data Services (CDS) within the S/4HANA environment.      Optimize and enhance existing CDS views for improved performance and data modeling.        ABAP Development:        Develop custom ABAP programs, enhancements, and interfaces to meet business needs.      Conduct code reviews and ensure adherence to best practices in ABAP development.        Fiori Development:        Design and implement SAP Fiori applications to enhance the user experience and streamline business processes.      Customize and extend standard Fiori apps to align with specific business requirements.      Integrate Fiori apps with backend ABAP systems and S/4HANA CDS views.        SAP BW Exposure:        Leverage SAP BW knowledge to understand data warehousing concepts and support integration scenarios with S/4HANA.      Collaborate with SAP BW teams to ensure seamless data flow between S/4HANA and SAP BW environments.      Provide expertise in data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) processes.                Requirements          Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.      Proven experience as an SAP Consultant with expertise in S/4HANA CDS, ABAP, Fiori, and exposure to SAP BW.      Strong hands-on experience in designing and developing CDS views, custom ABAP programs, and Fiori applications.      Exposure to SAP BW data warehousing concepts and integration scenarios.      Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to work effectively in a team-oriented environment

This could be by doing some RD on technical issues, creating Proof of Concept programs etc.     This person will be responsible for forming and leading a team of 7-8 developers and managing the deliverables as well as keeping the team motivated.         Technical - ABAP         Expertise with hands on development experience in RICEF (Reports, Interfaces, Conversion, Enhancements and Forms)     Hands-on expertise in below areas of ABAP:      Reports: Classical, Interactive and ALV (preferably ALV using OO Methodology)     Interfaces: BAPI, BDC, Flat file Interfaces (handling files on both Application Server and Presentation Server)     EDI-IDoc     Enhancements: BADI, User Exits and Customer Exits. Knowledge of Enhancement Spots would be added advantage.     Proficiency in areas like Data Dictionary and Performance Tuning.     Expertise in OO ABAP.       Knowledge on advanced ABAP areas such as Webdynpro and Workflow would be added advantage.           Development Standards/Development Process         By using project Standards and Processes, to review the technical design document to ensure the development work is in compliance with the specifications.     Hands on expertise in determining and/or validating the development effort estimates.     Assisting functional teams when necessary in the testing efforts and preparing test data.

column2: Position Title:  Oracle Apps Technical Consultant Location:  Any Birlasoft Location Company:  Birlasoft Job Type:  Full-Time About Birlasoft Birlasoft is a globally recognized IT consulting and software services company, part of the CK Birla Group. We specialize in delivering digital transformation solutions and IT consulting services for a wide range of industries, including manufacturing, financial services, healthcare, and energy. Birlasoft is dedicated to providing innovative technology solutions that drive business value, improve efficiency, and facilitate growth for our clients. Position Overview We are seeking an experienced Oracle Apps Technical Consultant to join our team. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS), including but not limited to Oracle Forms, Oracle Reports, Oracle Workflow, Oracle BI Publisher, and Oracle Applications Framework (OAF). The candidate should have a strong understanding of Oracle EBS architecture, modules, and technical components, and the ability to work in a collaborative team environment. Key Responsibilities Development and Customization:  Design, develop, and customize Oracle E-Business Suite applications, focusing on modules like Financials, HR, Supply Chain, and Manufacturing. Integration:  Integrate Oracle EBS with other systems and platforms, ensuring seamless data flow and connectivity. Troubleshooting and Support:  Provide technical support and troubleshoot issues related to Oracle EBS applications, working closely with end-users and support teams. Technical Documentation:  Create and maintain technical documentation, including design documents, user guides, and technical specifications. Testing and Quality Assurance:  Participate in system testing, user acceptance testing (UAT), and quality assurance activities to ensure the successful implementation of Oracle solutions. Collaboration and Communication:  Collaborate with business analysts, project managers, and other stakeholders to understand business requirements and deliver technical solutions that meet client needs. Qualifications and Experience Education:  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Experience:  At least 6-10 years of experience in Oracle E-Business Suite technical development and support. Technical Skills:  Proficiency in Oracle PL/SQL, Oracle Forms, Oracle Reports, Oracle Workflow, Oracle BI Publisher, and Oracle Applications Framework (OAF). Tools and Technologies:  Experience with development tools like SQL Developer, TOAD, and Oracle EBS R12. Experience with integration technologies such as Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC) is a plus. Soft Skills:  Excellent problem-solving skills, strong communication abilities, and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment. Preferred Qualifications Certification in Oracle EBS or related technologies. Experience with Oracle Cloud Applications. Knowledge of Agile and DevOps methodologies. Benefits and Compensation Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunities for career growth and development. A dynamic and collaborative work environment. Flexible work arrangements and remote work options. How to Apply If you meet the above qualifications and are interested in joining a dynamic and innovative team at Birlasoft, please submit your resume and cover letter through our careers portal or email to [Pranav.sardana@birlasoft.com]. Please include "Oracle Apps Technical Consultant" in the subject line. This job description provides a comprehensive overview of the role, responsibilities, qualifications, and company culture at Birlasoft. If you need more details or have any other questions, I'm here to help.

column2: Manage multiple concurrent deployment projects.   Apply knowledge of technologies and protocols to support identity federation and robust access control models, such as SAML 2.0, WS-Federation, OAuth, and OpenID Connect.   While providing customer service, apply knowledge of cloud architectures as well as complex enterprise on-premise IT landscapes.   You will use your SaaS deployment experience with applications such as Salesforce, Box, Office 365, Workday and HR as master for identities.   Apply software development experience (Java, Ruby, .Net, PHP, REST/JSON, etc) when working with customers.   Utilize knowledge of typical enterprise identity life cycle management processes and standards.   Apply experience with JavaScript and one of the major JavaScript MVC frameworks (Backbone, Angular, Ember, React, etc.) when working on customer integrations.   May provide mentoring, guidance, and expertise to less experienced team members.   Ensure quality and time management processes are followed by team (e.g., change controls, time tracking).   Commit to and use a knowledge repository for deployment standard methodologies and other customer ideas as continuous improvement.   25% future travel required to customer sites.   Qualifications:   5+ years experience as a technical consultant delivering solutions to external customers.   Software development experience (Java, Ruby, .Net, PHP, REST/JSON, etc).   Some knowledge of enterprise web technologies, security and cutting-edge infrastructures.   Experience with JavaScript and one of the major JavaScript MVC frameworks (Backbone, Angular, Ember, React, etc.)   Familiar with API management using Mulesoft, Axway or Apigee preferred.   Ability to work independently and multi-functionally supporting the development of client work you're doing.   General knowledge of cloud architectures as well as complex enterprise on-premise IT landscapes.   Knowledge of typical enterprise identity life cycle management processes and standards.   SaaS deployment experience: Salesforce, Box, Office 365, Workday and HR as master for identities preferred.   Ability to Multi-task and manage multiple customer engagements is a requirement.   Able and willing to be a hands-on contributor.   Superb communication skills, including issue tracking, triaging and crisis management.   Experience in Process Improvement, Decision-making, Managing Processes, Planning, Analyzing Information and Developing Standards.   Nice to have:   Experience in designing and implementing security and identity management solutions to support critical systems and business programs.   Experience with technologies and protocols to support identity federation and robust access control models (e.g., SAML 2.0, WS-Federation, OAuth, OpenID Connect).   AD and LDAP experience is preferred.  Problem Solving:   Exhibits confidence and an extensive knowledge of emerging industry practices when solving business problems.   Asks probing questions to elicit facts and clarify a situation.   Identifies critical issues with ease.   Engages appropriate resource to obtain information, seek suggestions and acquire assistance.   Pushes creative thinking beyond the boundaries of existing industry practices and customer mindsets.   Communication:   Communicates with internal and external customers and all levels of management.   Effectively communicate technical information to non-technical audiences.   Delivers informative, well-organized presentations.   Understands how to communicate difficult/sensitive information thoughtfully.   Uses active listening skills to figure out and understand the customer's business goals, objectives and priorities.   Education: A Bachelor's degree (or equivalent) in Computer Science, Information Technology or related discipline required.

column2: The Senior Oracle EBS Developer will have strong Oracle EBS experience. This person will design, execute and support software application designs throughout project life cycles within the IT architecture. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in Oracle databases, SQL query optimization techniques, and database performance tuning. The Oracle EBS Developer will work with IT Leads, Business users and other IT team members to understand and evaluate functional requirements, review technology/application alternatives, and develop technical solutions, designs, coding, testing and support eBusiness implementation/upgrades. column2: We currently have an Integration Engineer (Integrations Software) position open in Hyderabad, Telangana (India). In this position, you will be a Subject Matter Expert for one or more pre-built integration products as well as custom integrations (non-pre-built). In this position, you will develop custom integration data flows and/or perform configurations of pre-built products and support such products and/or custom integrations. This position involves a high level of client interaction via calls and online meetings, responding to emails and chats in a timely manner, participating in cross-functional product-related meetings, and other related activities.                   Desired Qualifications         At least three (3) years of combined industry experience in at least one of the following areas: enterprise software implementation, business analysis, or business process consulting.         Experience working with external clients on system implementations or training.         Experience with CRM (Salesforce etc.), ERP (NetSuite, etc), or eCommerce (Magento, Shopify, etc) applications is preferred.         Prior experience in SaaS / On-Demand applications is preferred e.g. Celigo s integrator.io platform, Boomi, Jitterbit, Workato.         Understanding and experience with application integration technologies and projects is preferred.         Ability to work independently, demonstrated excellent interpersonal, analytical and communication skills with the ability to communicate complex technical issues in an easy-to-understand manner.         Experience working in a fast paced environment with the ability to manage multiple concurrent projects.         Customer satisfaction and problem solving skills are essential.         Experience in a startup and product development environment is highly desired along with experience launching a complex Enterprise Software Product.         Ability to conduct oneself with professionalism in all situations, including in high pressure scenarios.               Project Delivery        Lead and participate in client meetings as you educate, train, and advise clients on how to successfully implement products. Frequent client calls are a regular part of this responsibility.         Delight clients by completing their implementations successfully, on-time and within budget.         Regularly meet with team members and the client to deliver status updates, resolve project issues and design solutions.         Ask thoughtful, probing questions to understand the customer s business requirements and accurately configure the products to meet these requirements.         Complete thorough testing of the solution prior to handing it off to the client. Provide timely response and issue resolution during User Acceptance Testing.         Keep the project on target with respect to scope and timeline by recognizing scope creep and following defined processes to address or mitigate.         Provide go-live support, knowledge transfer, and documentation as necessary.                   Customer Support        Act as Level 2 technical support. Take ownership of customer support cases, engage with customers to understand and reproduce the issue, and work with Level 1 technical support, services engineers, and product developers to resolve the issue and respond to the customer.                 What would you do, if hired?         Develop custom integrations between a customer s different systems.         Develop custom logic to format data sets between different systems.         Utilize Celigo s integrator.io platform to integrate systems such as NetSuite, Salesforce.com, Amazon, and many more.         Perform end-to-end testing of the solution.         Provide go-live support, general support and knowledge transfer to the internal project team.         Training customers on usage of products. Object Oriented JavaScript         Server Side JavaScript         Node.js         Web Services (SOA) SOAP / REST         Data Formats Flat File / XML / JSON         Cloud Applications such as NetSuite, Salesforce, Amazon, Google, Shopify, Magento, and many others besides         Legacy technologies like FTP, ACH, Fixed width, and EDI are a bonus                 Common Traits We Admire         Enjoy the start-up atmosphere, and flexibility with shifting priorities. Must be willing to do what it takes to make each project or task a success.         Quick learner. Must know when to listen and when to take charge. column1: Patent - Design - Technical Consultant - Associate - Analyst
column2: As a Technical Consultant - Associate - Analyst, you will contribute your scientific training and expertise to advise the Supervising Attorneys on cases relating to Intellectual Property prosecution, transaction issues and Litigation for clients. Your responsibilities will include reviewing technical, scientific documents and identifying key issues relating to the legal matters at issue while accomplishing these and other critical functions:       Providing technical support for preparation and prosecuting patent applications in India, USPTO and EPO.         Distilling complex scientific concepts and explaining them in terms understandable to non-scientists such as attorneys, judges and juries.         Assisting in preparation for depositions and trial, preparing technical witnesses for their testimony as well as developing exhibits for trial.         Interacting with attorneys, paralegals, clients, experts, inventors and scientists.     Skills and Experience      Fresher and experienced both can apply.         An advanced degree in Biochemistry, Chemistry, Pharmacology, Material Science, Electrical Engineering, Information Technology, Mechanical Engineering or related field is required.         Outstanding writing and analytical skills, and top academic credentials are essential and be able to work well with lawyers, other professionals and staff within the firm.         Capable of handling independent correspondence with client, associate and IP Office and Courts.         Should have strong verbal and written communication skills, should be willing to work independent as well as in a team.         Knowledge of Windows, Ms Office, Internet Email - Must         Highly organized with ability to prioritize and multitask         Flexibility and willingness to work on a wide variety of matters         Be looking for an opportunity to grow         Terms and conditions   : Candidates will be required to sign a contract for a minimum period of one years

column2: We offer a career with growth opportunities in a dynamic, collaborative, and supportive organization. We also have a strong and ethical working culture. If youd to work with a team that is passionate about their work while also having a good sense of fun, you might have just found what you are looking for!     sa.global is looking for a motivated and skilled    D365 Customer Engagement (CE) Technical Consultant    to join our dynamic consulting team in India!       Main Responsibilities as a D365 CE Technical Consultant          Customize and configure the D365 CE platform using various tools and technologies including but not limited to Power Apps, Power Automate (formerly Microsoft Flow), and Power BI     Design, develop, and deploy custom solutions, plugins, custom workflows, and integrations using the D365 CE SDK (Software Development Kit), C#, JavaScript, and other relevant programming languages     Extend the functionality of D365 CE by creating custom entities, attributes, relationships, and business rules to meet the specific business requirements of the organization     Implement integrations with other systems, both within the Microsoft ecosystem (e.g., SharePoint, Azure, Office 365) and external third-party applications using various integration methods and APIs     Assist in data migration activities including data extraction, transformation, and loading into the D365 CE platform.     Conduct unit testing and debugging of customizations to ensure that they meet the specified requirements and are free of defects     Create and maintain technical documentation, including technical design documents, code documentation, and deployment instructions.     Ensure that all customizations and developments adhere to security and compliance standards, including data protection and access control.     Collaborate with functional consultants, business analysts, and other stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.     Keep up-to-date with the latest features, updates, and best practices related to D365 CE development and ensure that the organization is leveraging the platform effectively         Skills and Experience         Demonstrated experience as a D365 CE Developer     Strong proficiency in C#, JavaScript, HTML, and web services development     Familiar with D365 CE customization and configuration using Power Apps, Power Automate, and Power BI     Knowledge of D365 CE SDK and development tools such as Visual Studio and Azure DevOps     Experience with integration tools and methods, RESTful APIs, and data migration     Understanding of software development best practices, including version control and code review processes     Graduate degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field     Proven experience as a D365 CE Developer or similar role with a focus on customizing and extending the D365 CE platform     Strong problem-solving and analytical skills with the ability to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues     Microsoft certifications in Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement (e.g., Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Developer Associate) are highly desirable     Ability to work independently and as part of a global team     Possess strong relationship-building expertise with a wide and varied audience, internally and externally

column2: Role & responsibilities:   Delivering regular and reliable risk metrics, analytics & insights based on deep understanding of the firms businesses and its client activities. Building robust, systematic & efficient workflows, processes and procedures around the production of risk analytics for financial & non-financial risk, risk capital and regulatory reporting. Attesting to the quality, timeliness and completeness of the underlying data used to produce these analytics.   Qualifications, Skills & Aptitude:   Masters or Bachelors degree in a quantitative discipline such as data science, mathematics, physics, econometrics, computer science or engineering. Entrepreneurial, analytically creative, self-motivated and team-oriented. Excellent written, verbal and team-oriented communication skills. Experience with programming for extract transform load (ETL) operations and data analysis (including performance optimization) using languages such as, but not limited to, Python, Java, C++, SQL and R. Experience in developing data visualization and business intelligence solutions using tools such as, but not limited to, Tableau, Alteryx, PowerBI, and front-end technologies and languages. Working knowledge of the financial industry, markets and products and associated non-financial risk. Working knowledge of mathematics including statistics, time series analysis and numerical algorithms. 3+ years of financial or non-financial risk industry experience.

column1: Oracle Cloud HCM Offshore Developer - Managed Services
column2: Alithya is seeking a highly motivated, career-oriented Oracle Cloud HCM Developer to join their growing organisation.  About They are looking for candidates who are passionate about delivering consistently great experiences and superior quality work products to their Oracle Cloud Applications Center of Excellence (COE) Team. Your primary responsibility will be to develop, maintain and support integrations, extensions, reports, and applications components for Oracle HCM Cloud to meet the unique business needs of Alithyas Client base. Design, build, test, implement and document complex information systems and processes in large-scale multi-tier environments. Deliver end user value in the form of high-quality software components, integrations, and services in adherence with Proso's policies on compliance, security, performance, longevity, and reusability. Have a strong passion to deliver best in class solutions by adopting creative solutions to work around system limitations, keeping team leads and Project Managers informed. Own, implement and maintain best practice solutions for Oracle HCM Cloud RICEW objects. Drive software through the software development life cycle (SDLC) starting with requirements analysis and modeling though implementation, debugging, deployment and ongoing support. Create and maintain accurate, unambiguous technical design documents with appropriate level of detail in a standardized format. Collaborate with functional, technical and PMO team members to complete the assigned tasks on schedule and within the estimated effort. Work with senior team member(s) and team leads to ensure compliance to design standards and contribute to policies on development, design and best practices for code quality, performance, and architecture. Work collaboratively across the US on-site and offshore teams to ensure alignment towards unified project goals and deliverables. Participate in technical work sessions with clients or cross functional teams for design specifications, for new and existing technical components. Be flexible and willing to learn and adapt to the changing needs of their growing business. Track and maintain all development activities in designated software development tracking solution. Communicate and work effectively within and across teams to achieve assigned goals. Mentor and train new team members to maximize overall productivity and effectiveness of the team. Requires little or no direction on day-to-day work or new assignments. Required Education, Skills And Experience Relevant professional hands-on experience with at least 2-3 implementation in Oracle Cloud HCM. B.Tech/BE/M.Tech/MCA in computer science, information systems or software engineering from an accredited University. Strong knowledge of software development principles, processes, concepts, and techniques. Strong knowledge of the following Oracle technologies: OTBI, BI Publisher, Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC). Experience in designing and developing large scale real-time and file-based batch type integrations between third-party systems and Oracle Cloud HCM Applications using SOAP and REST API based services. Experience with SQL and PL/SQL, OTBI, BIP, RTF templates, FBDI, ADF desktop integrator (ADFdi), HDL, HSDL, Fast Formulas and Workflow tools. Knowledge of Java, XML, JDeveloper, Visual Builder Cloud Service, APEX, Groovy Scripting, and Cloud Framework native to Oracle Fusion Applications. Deep understanding of REST and SOAP APIs of Oracle Cloud HCM and building ETL based integrations through these APIs. Experience working in a Sprint driven, Agile project environment and traditional waterfall methodologies. High level functional knowledge of Oracle Modules related to HCM. Some examples are Core HR, Recruiting, Performance Management, Compensation, Absence Management, Time and Labor, Benefits and Payroll. High level knowledge of Oracle Cloud Fusion Security framework. Excellent communication both verbal and oral in English, analytical, and problem-solving skills. Travel: Short term US/Canada travel basis requirement
column11: Oracle Cloud HCM Developer, HCM, FBDI, ADF, OIC, OTBI, Workflow, SOAP, SDLC, HDL, Rest, PMO, Fast Formula, RICEW, Bi Publisher, Hcm Extracts

column2: The Corporate Systems Group (CSG) is responsible for the strategy and implementation of systems solutions that support actual and plan allocations for Verizon Finance.  The Sr. Engineer-Systems Engineering position is the interface between different stakeholder groups and is comprehensively responsible for the design and delivery of large-scale, complex allocation models with a significant impact on Verizon.  This role will specifically focus on delivering allocation solutions capable of executing complex scenarios and rules that span across plan and actuals. This individual will be the product technical lead for the SAP PaPM product team and will interface with business, platform architects, agile teams, and S&O for the successful implementation of the product roadmap.  We are looking for an SAP PaPM expert with experience leading and developing allocation solutions aligned with allocation methodologies. Defining business requirements, leading the design and implementation process, testing application capabilities, and training other team members and business users. Proactively working with the end-user community to improve business processes and procedures. Leading the product journey from ideation to implementation by partnering with business stakeholders. Defining and re-engineering business systems or information technology processes by using appropriate methods and tools and partnering with process owners to understand requirements. Partnering with vendors and participating in various SAP conferences, innovations, and design workshops to build innovative capabilities in the product roadmap. Working closely with the Platform Services team to ensure a timely solution according to the specifications and implementation of business needs. Leading within a shared team to execute, status, and resolving Functional Unit (FUT), Integrated (ITC), and User Acceptance Testing (UAT) issues. Using a flexible and collaborative work approach to solve complex problems and to develop customer-specific solutions - taking into account multiple internal and external stakeholder groups and different levels of stakeholder groups (e.g., Top-Management) with various/changing stakeholder demands/requirements and intersections (e.g., IT, Finance, Top-management level). Adhering to Verizon policies and procedures. Where you'll be working In this hybrid role, you'll have a defined work location that includes work from home and assigned office days set by your manager. What were looking for... Youll need to have: Youll need to have: Bachelors degree or four or more years of experience. Four or more years of experience with a strong design background and configuration experience in SAP PaPM or relevant work experience. Direct allocation build experience during SAP PaPM implementations. Experience with full lifecycle implementation projects. Willingness to travel up to approximately 25% of the time. Even better if you have one or more of the following: A Master's degree in Computer Science, Business, Engineering, Information Technology, or Information Systems. Proven past success with complex system program implementations with SAP PaPM. Well-versed in researching and identifying SAP Notes to resolve any product gaps. Ability to perform in a high-volume, fast-paced changing environment with good time-management skills and the ability to manage teams independently. Excellent interpersonal, influencing, communication and organizational skills and the ability to deliver across levels. Demonstrated highly-developed team leadership skills and the ability to manage internal/external resources to achieve project objectives. Demonstrated ability to operate independently and remain focused through change or uncertainty. Experience in executive communication including presentation preparation and delivery. Agile delivery expertise in an SAP ERP landscape. Experiencing managing across multiple time zones. Telecommunications experience. SAP PaPM experience with SAP BW and BW/4Hana. Experience integrating actuals and plan data with allocation models SAP technical and functional allocations architecture, allocation model skills along with calculations and write-back experience. Formal training and/or certifications in the SAP product family. Strong organizational skills to coordinate and manage multiple cross-divisional work processes and projects. Ability to develop, manage, and mentor junior staff.

column1: Field Service Management Senior Application Consultant
column2: The Functional Consultant will support the Mobile Workforce Management solution within IFS     Our mobile applications and platforms enable gas, water, and electric utilities to scale their workforce in the field and leverage the latest technologies in their day-to-day work     We enable utilities to transform their field operations by rapidly automating and optimizing any field work activity or process to improve response time and effectiveness     Our platforms offer utility operations personnel in both the office and field improved location and situational awareness for faster, more intelligent decision-making, greater safety and easier regulatory compliance     This position requires a dynamic, self-driven, technically savvy individual who wants to be a part of our Consulting team     This person is responsible for the successful deployment of the IFS Clevest MWM solution for our customers     This person will manage all functional aspects of implementation projects     This can include conducting business requirements and solution design workshops, providing technical and architectural leadership in configuration and integration, and working with customers through iterative testing cycles     Whatever the task, you will work to propose and deliver solutions that meet requirements and exceed expectations, leading the way for prospects, customers, partners, and internal teams by designing and overseeing the implementation of solutions that deliver exceptional ROI and customer satisfaction           The Consultant is expected to succeed in complex technical environments while simultaneously displaying exceptional communication skills to effectively work with enterprise customers of varying technical aptitudes. This position requires travel to customer sites, primarily within APJMEA (expected travel up to 75%).        ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:          Elicit business drivers, problems, and desired use cases and map them to how IFS products can uniquely enable customers to achieve their goals and objectives      Lead solution and integration design workshops with customer SMEs and end-users      Architect configuration solutions via business requirements, solution design, and integration design documentation      Translate customer business processes into logical steps with a low-code/no-code development platform      Provide leadership to internal and partner project teams through iterative configuration and testing cycles      Ensure exceptional quality of project deliverables via concise triage of customer-reported issues, unit testing, and liaising with Customer Support and development resources      Contribute to Epics and Stories for the product roadmap, working in concert with Product Managers, Product Owners, and development resources      Be a trusted advisor to prospects, customers, and partners as a product and technology expert during the pre-sales, implementation and beyond          Qualifications          Minimum of 3 years in customer-facing project, delivery, or technical sales engineering roles in software consulting      Post-secondary education in an engineering, business or computer science related degree is preferred, or an equivalent combination of education and experience      Dynamic personality with excellent verbal and written communication skills and a passion to lead customer workshops      Familiarity with basic programming concepts (e.g., if/then/else, variables, etc.), common integration paradigms (REST APIs, SOAP Web Services), relational databases, and client-server architecture      Extraordinary personal time management skills with proven record of juggling multiple initiatives simultaneously      Excellent interpersonal skills to work with clients, team-members and executives in a positive and professional manner      Minimum of 3 years in customer-facing project, delivery, or technical sales engineering roles in software consulting      Post-secondary education in an engineering, business or computer science related degree is preferred, or an equivalent combination of education and experience      Willingness to travel within APJMEA and internationally (occasional) up to 75% of the time          Additional Information            KEY COMPETENCIES            Teamwork, Commercial Awareness, Communication, Influencing Others, Customer Orientation, Thoroughness, Self-Confidence, Flexibility.      Solid understanding of local business policies and practices.      As a person, you act proactively with a positive mindset and always have the willingness to win, align with our IFS Core Values
column11: Computer science, Service management, Architecture, Consulting, IFS, Presales, Customer support, Unit testing, Project delivery, Server architecture

column2: A Systems Engineer owns technical relationships with customers and prospects, which involves evangelizing the value of Event-Driven Architecture on a day-to-day basis to a wide array of audiences, from C levels to developers. Systems Engineers also drive and own solutions, value propositions, and Technical Proof of Concepts with prospects for identified sales opportunities and help customers and prospects familiarize themselves with Solace technology from conceptual to hands-on levels.           This position will require travel based on customer needs, and sometimes globally. The individual will work closely with the sales team to support customers on a technical level, run customer presentations, customer trials, and customer integration/architecture, and help in the prospecting and development of new accounts.             What You ll Bring to the Role:               Undergraduate degree, ideally in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering; Master s in science, Business or Engineering an asset.             Experience in technology/presales/technical strategy consulting roles in the integration and or Event Broker space.             Legally able to work in India.                   It Would Be Great If You Also Have:               Ability to articulate technical concepts and solutions to various audiences, from CTOs/CIOs to Developers, evangelizing modern concepts to help transform traditional solutions, especially in the integration and digital domains.             Solid presentation and white-boarding skills. This role is customer-facing so the successful candidate must have solid presentation and communication skills and be ready to take on the challenges of a fast-moving, fast-growing, and dynamic environment. Stakeholder engagement, as well as technical leadership team handholding, would be required. Presales experience would be an asset.             Eventing and Messaging Middleware/Integration Understanding of the application middleware space. Technical knowledge of Event Streaming and messaging products such as IBM MQ, TIBCO EMS/RV, and/or Open Source technologies such as Rabbit, ActiveMQ, Kafka, Pulsar, etc. would be beneficial to the role.             Understanding of EDA API and SOA concepts and a working background in JMS, AMQP, REST, JavaScript, MQTT would all be assets.             Enterprise Integration Patterns and Solution architecture experience would be an asset. Knowledge of Digital patterns, application lifecycle management, and continuous integration.             Domain knowledge (from a systems integration perspective) of FSI / Telecommunications / Transportation / Insurance / Manufacturing / Retail would be very useful.             Application Integration with Java, JavaScript, ESB/API tools, and/or C /C             Experience with software development in either Java or C /C, SDKs, and API integration.             Working experience with Technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes, PaaS platforms.         Overall industry knowledge about Cloud, IoT, Big Data, Digital, networking, and other topical technology domains would be beneficial.

column1: Oracle Hyperion Apps Administrator - Cloud Migration
column2: Job Role : Oracle Hyperion Apps Administrator (Cloud Migration) Exp Level : 5+ years Interview Mode : Virtual Interview Work Location : Bangalore, Hyderabad, Mumbai, Kolkata (Hybrid) Mode of position : Fulltime & Permanent with Techstar Job Description :  An experienced Oracle Hyperion Apps Administrator to support the lift and shift of our Hyperion applications to the cloud. As a Hyperion Apps Administrator, you will be responsible for migrating, managing and maintaining the Oracle Hyperion suite of applications, including Hyperion Planning, Hyperion Essbase, Hyperion Financial Management (HFM), and Hyperion Data Relationship Management (DRM) etc. Responsibilities : - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to plan and execute the migration of Hyperion applications to the cloud platform. - Configure, install, and maintain Oracle Hyperion applications in the cloud environment. - Monitor and troubleshoot performance issues, ensuring optimal system performance and availability. - Implement security measures and access controls to protect sensitive financial data. - Collaborate with business users to understand their requirements and provide technical support for Hyperion applications. - Conduct regular system maintenance activities, including patching, upgrades, and backups. - Develop and maintain documentation related to system configurations, processes, and procedures. Requirements : - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field. - Proven experience as an Oracle Hyperion Apps Administrator, preferably with experience in cloud migration projects. - Strong knowledge of administration of Oracle Hyperion suite of applications, including Hyperion Planning, Essbase, HFM, and DRM. - Experience with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) or Azure or other cloud platforms. - Proficient in administering and troubleshooting Hyperion applications, including performance tuning and optimization. - Familiarity with Oracle databases and SQL Server DB. - Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. - Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams. - Ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment. Who can join Immediate - 30 days is must.
column11: Cloud Migration, Oracle DB, Oracle Apps, Oracle System Administration, Hyperion Financials Reporting, Oracle Cloud Infrastructure, Oracle DRM, Oracle Cloud, Oracle HFM, Hyperion, Essbase

column2: Responsibilities A day in the life of an Infoscion As part of the Infosys consulting team, your primary role would be to actively aid the consulting team in different phases of the project including problem definition, effort estimation, diagnosis, solution generation and design and deployment  You will explore the alternatives to the recommended solutions based on research that includes literature surveys, information available in public domains, vendor evaluation information, etc. and build POCs  You will create requirement specifications from the business needs, define the to-be-processes and detailed functional designs based on requirements.  You will support configuring solution requirements on the products; understand if any issues, diagnose the root-cause of such issues, seek clarifications, and then identify and shortlist solution alternatives  You will also contribute to unit-level and organizational initiatives with an objective of providing high quality value adding solutions to customers. If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! Technical and Professional Requirements: At least 2 years of experience in SAP Basis Monitor and maintain SAP systems environments (Sandbox, Development, QA, Production and DR etc.,) Install, configure, maintain, support multiple SAP landscapes and 3rd party tools. Perform core Basis functions (e.g., System Refresh, support packs, kernels, transports, DR drills) Research and implement solutions for Basis functionality in performance monitoring, tuning, systems configuration using the SAP Best Practice Experience in system refreshes and restores of dual (ABAP+JAVA) and single stack systems. Working experiences in business suite of SAP, SAP HANA. Experience in installing, configuring and support Solution Manager Experience in Upgrades, OS/DB Migrations and Cloud will be added advantage. Experience of working with global delivery models including offshore, multi-cultural teams, functional teams & other stake holders. Willing to work in 24x7 support environment.  Preferred Skills:  Technology->SAP Basis Administration->SAP HANA Basis/DBA Technology->SAP functional->S4 HANA - Basis  Additional Responsibilities: Ability to work with clients to identify business challenges and contribute to client deliverables by refining, analyzing, and structuring relevant data Awareness of latest technologies and trends Logical thinking and problem solving skills along with an ability to collaborate Ability to assess the current processes, identify improvement areas and suggest the technology solutions  One or two industry domain knowledge  SAP Certification will be added advantage. Location of posting - Infosys Ltd. is committed to ensuring you have the best experience throughout your journey with us. We currently have open positions in a number of locations across India - Bangalore, Pune, Hyderabad, Chennai, Chandigarh, Trivandrum, Indore, Nagpur, Mangalore, Noida, Bhubaneswar, Vizag, Coimbatore, Mumbai, Jaipur, Mysore, Kolkata. While we work in accordance with business requirements, we shall strive to offer you the location of your choice, where possible.  Educational Requirements Bachelor of Engineering,Bachelor Of Technology  Service Line Enterprise Package Application Services *  Location of posting is subject to business requirements

column2: Education: BE/B.Tech/M.Tech/MCA       Imagine working in a place where your individuality is celebrated, your efforts are recognised by everyone, and you feel you re making a real difference every day. A place where you re positively encouraged and supported to learn and grow. And a place that puts fulfillment, happiness, and well-being at the top of its priority list.    This is a day-to-day life at ZeTechno.           At ZeTechno, we have consistently delivered on providing the freedom of a startup environment coupled with the assurance of leading technology.         We are a fast-growing and energetic digital transformation company partnered with ServiceNow.       You will be our go-to consultant for managing ServiceNow advisory and implementation projects for our clients along with ITOM expertise.       Responsibilities:         Delivery of consulting services to install, configure, and integrate software products from ServiceNow with a focus on the ITOM based products (discovery, service mapping, configuration management, event management)         Develop Custom patterns as required through scripting and software development         Prepare technical documentation as specified in customer contracts and as internally required         Support the development and growth of the services delivered by ZeTechno         Support sales of software and services through demonstrations, Proof of Concepts, and customer presentations         Deliver projects on customer premise or remotely as required.         Provide value-based assessments and workshops to help the customer maximize business results from ServiceNow software. Skill required to perform the duty:         Ideal candidate will have at least 5 years of IT software consulting experience with 3-5 years experience supporting or implementing ServiceNow products.         ServiceNow experience with discovery, event management, service mapping, and configuration management (CMDB) is crucial. ServiceNow is the fastest-growing technology platform in the world creating tremendous opportunities for ServiceNow practitioners.         You would work on high-impact and challenging projects across the different businesses in ZeTechno         You will be constantly challenged to think about innovating and improving our way of working, setting up best practices, and being a thought leader in the company.         Working hand in hand with project stakeholders, delivery owners/managers, platform architects, developers, and administrators.         You would lead a team of similar developers         You will preferably be required to work from our office in Hyderabad(We allow Hybrid work models as well).

column2: DefineRight is a business and technology services company that is committed to increasing the success of Clients strategic transformation project by efficiently navigating through the complexity and chaos of execution by using our Business Enablement Services Framework. More details can be found out on https://www.defineright.com/ A brief video link for DefineRight explaining our Services in brief can be found at the following link https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LeUEIsvCJs8 We are seeking a talented and experienced Salesforce Developer with 4 to 6 years of hands-on experience to join our team. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in developing and customizing Salesforce applications using Apex and Lightning Web Components (LWC), as well as a certification in Copado Deployment for managing Salesforce deployments efficiently. As a Salesforce Developer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining solutions that meet our business requirements and contribute to the overall success of our Salesforce platform. Key Responsibilities: Develop and customize Salesforce applications using Apex, Visualforce, Lightning Components, and Lightning Web Components (LWC). Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze business requirements, and translate them into technical solutions within Salesforce. Design, develop, and maintain integrations between Salesforce and other systems using REST/SOAP APIs, Middleware, and other integration tools. Implement best practices for code development, version control, testing, and deployment within the Salesforce environment using Copado Deployment. Perform code reviews and provide constructive feedback to ensure high-quality code and adherence to coding standards. Troubleshoot and debug issues related to Salesforce configurations, customizations, and integrations. Stay current with Salesforce platform updates, releases, and new features, and evaluate their potential impact on existing solutions. Collaborate with cross-functional teams including Business Analysts, QA Engineers, and System Administrators to deliver end-to-end solutions. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. 4 to 6 years of experience as a Salesforce Developer, with a proven track record of successful Salesforce implementations and integrations. Strong proficiency in Apex programming language, including triggers, batch classes, and asynchronous processing. Experience with Lightning Web Components (LWC) development and customization. Proficiency in Salesforce configuration and customization using Workflows, Process Builder, Validation Rules, and Formula Fields. Hands-on experience with Salesforce data model, including custom objects, fields, relationships, and data migration. Copado Deployment certification for managing Salesforce deployments efficiently. Experience with Salesforce DX, Git, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes is a plus. Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot technical issues independently. Strong communication skills with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Salesforce certifications such as Salesforce Certified Platform Developer I/II are preferred.

column2: Squirrel Softech Services Pvt Ltd  is looking for SAP BASIS Consultant  to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey    ?     The Basis Consultant at Level 3 is a highly skilled professional responsible for the administration, configuration, and maintenance of SAP systems and infrastructure. This role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure the reliability, security, and performance of SAP applications. The Basis Consultant at this level is expected to have a deep understanding of SAP technologies and best practices, and to provide expert-level support to resolve complex technical issues.           Key Responsibilities:       1. SAP System Administration:     - Perform installation, configuration, and upgrades of SAP applications and systems.     - Monitor system performance, analyze logs, and implement tuning and optimization strategies.     - Manage SAP system landscape, including integration with databases, servers, and networking components.     2. Technical Support:     - Provide expert-level support for resolving complex technical issues related to SAP systems.     - Collaborate with functional teams to troubleshoot and resolve issues affecting system functionality and performance.     - Lead efforts to diagnose and address problems, ensuring minimal downtime and disruptions.     3. Security and Compliance:     - Implement and maintain security measures to safeguard SAP systems and data.     - Ensure compliance with relevant industry standards and data protection regulations.     - Perform regular security assessments and vulnerability scans, addressing any identified risks.     4. Performance Monitoring and Enhancement:     - Monitor system performance, analyze bottlenecks, and propose performance improvement measures.     - Optimize system configurations, database parameters, and memory settings to enhance system responsiveness.     5. System Upgrades and Patch Management:     - Plan and execute system upgrades, patches, and updates in coordination with functional teams.     - Validate compatibility of new releases and patches with existing environments.     6. Backup and Recovery:     - Develop and implement backup and recovery strategies to ensure data integrity and availability.     - Regularly test and verify backup and restore processes to maintain disaster recovery readiness.     7. Documentation and Training:     - Maintain comprehensive documentation for system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps.     - Provide training and knowledge sharing to junior team members and other relevant stakeholders.     8. Collaboration and Communication:     - Collaborate with other technical teams and departments to ensure seamless integration of SAP systems with other IT infrastructure.     - Communicate effectively with stakeholders, providing status updates, incident reports, and solutions.           Qualifications and Experience:       - 3 to 5 years of experience working with SAP Basis administration.     - Proven experience with SAP installations, upgrades, and performance optimization.     - Strong knowledge of SAP architecture, landscape design, and system integration.     - Proficiency in SAP security practices and compliance requirements.     - Experience with SAP HANA and other relevant databases.     - Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex technical issues.     - Effective communication and collaboration skills.     - SAP Basis certifications are a plus.     - Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and DevOps practices is a plus.
column11: Patch management, Networking, Security management, System integration, Disaster recovery, Oracle, Troubleshooting, SyBase, Technical support, System administration

column2: Job Description The SAP Techno Functional consultant handles the development, optimization, and integration of various systems and will assist product and project teams with their short- and long-term vision. He/she is a subject expert, managing the process design, configuration and requirement gathering for SAP OTC, as well as integration touch points to other processes and systems. In this role, he/she will be responsible for hands-on with cross-functional teams tasked with solving business requirements. He/she will estimate, configure and leverage SAP functionality to meet core business process needs. This position would interface regularly with business stakeholders, development teams, and third parties to ensure that business requirements are met through proper system design and configuration.
