column2: Analyze, plan, design, develop, and customize Ariba Buyer solutions to meet strategic, usability, performance, reliability, control, and security requirements to enable automate the Procure to Pay cycle using Ariba solutions.      Requires high level of skills in supporting Ariba applications. Must be innovative.        Work youll do    A unique opportunity to be a part of Ariba team to support and do enhancements for the Ariba Buyer & Contracts application. You will be responsible for delivering customizations to the Ariba application which supports automated procurement.      - Help in design, development, and support and configuration management of procurement applications.    - Communicate implications in architectural decisions, issues and impediments during design review & development / support to Manager/Architect.    - Provide input to approach, estimates and design thoughts for project initiatives.    - Create technical specification and establish traceability to business requirements and application architecture/design.    - Ability to work with members of the team in near and remote locations for successful implementation of solution and resolution of issues.    - Participate and lead technical discussion when needed during design, development, test & deployment phase.    - Ability to do configuration, development and support duties for Source to Pay applications.    - Seeking and capitalizing on the opportunities to improve solution quality and efficiency.    - Exhibiting high level of professional flexibility and volunteering innovation and new ideas.    - Creating a culture that is based on knowledge sharing and learning from best practices.    - Creativity and ability to think outside-the-box while defining sound and practical solutions.    - Provide regular project status to engagement manager/ technical delivery manager.    - Participate in the continuous improvement processes, as assigned      The key skills required    Technical Skills:    - Implementation experience on Ariba On Demand solutions    - 4+ years experience in development and implementation or support of Ariba Downstream modules using AML, Ariba API, Java and AQL.    - 2+ years experience with Oracle and/or Microsoft SQL Server as backend is preferred.    - Experience with integration of Ariba and ERP (like SAP) using middleware technologies (like PI) is preferred.    - Knowledge or experience on SAP is a plus.    - Strong analytical, problem solving and multi-tasking skills, as well as communication and interpersonal skills, is required.    - Strong verbal and written communication skills, with an ability to express complex business concepts in non-technical terms.    Preferred:    - Working knowledge of Eclipse and open source IDE is a plus.    - Experience in working with On Demand/On Cloud Ariba solution is a plus    - Experience in working with SAP Field glass solution is a plus    - Experience in web services is a plus.    - Experience in Agile development environment is a plus        Project Skills:    - Strong communication skills regarding technical topics and remote collaboration skills are critical to this role.    - Demonstrates an ability to provide accurate project estimates and timelines.    - Demonstrates an ability to deliver on project commitments.    - Produces work that consistently meets quality standards.        Leadership Skills:    - Demonstrates the ability to operate as the primary day-to-day resource on a project    - Demonstrates the ability to work with peers on project assignments and with the lead on critical activies of the project.    - Demonstrates a working ability to foster a cooperative environment with the entire project team. This resource is viewed as a team player, who understands the culture and how to be effective in it.    - Builds rapport with colleagues and clients    - Lets people know the "why" behind requests    - Suspends self-interest; authentic and genuine    - Able to energize and motivate team by exhibiting positive energy    - Demonstrates great work ethic

column2: As a Sr. Technical Consultant for Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central, you will play a crucial role in implementing, customizing, and supporting the Business Central solution for our clients. You will be responsible for translating business requirements into technical solutions, configuring the system, and providing technical expertise throughout the implementation process. Your role will involve working closely with clients, project managers, functional consultants, and development teams to deliver successful Business Central projects.       Key Responsibilities           Solution Design and Implementation   :      Analyse client business requirements and translate them into technical specifications.     Configure and customize Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central to meet client needs.     Develop and implement technical solutions, including integrations, customizations, and extensions.     Collaborate with functional consultants to ensure seamless integration of business processes with the technical solution.           Technical Consultation and Support:       Provide expert guidance and advice on technical aspects of Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central.     Assist clients in resolving technical issues, troubleshooting system errors, and optimizing system performance.     Conduct system testing, debugging, and quality assurance to ensure the solution meets client expectations.     Deliver training and knowledge transfer sessions to clients and end-users on technical aspects of the system.           Project Collaboration and Documentation:       Collaborate with project managers, functional consultants, and development teams to ensure smooth project execution.     Participate in project planning, estimation, and resource allocation activities.     Document technical specifications, configurations, customizations, and integrations for future reference and knowledge sharing.     Stay up to date with the latest technology advancements, product updates, and industry best practices related to Business Central.             Job Specification / Qualification: -         Any Graduate / Postgraduate     Minimum Experience of 3 - 5 years of experience in Microsoft D365 - Navision/ Business Central.     In-depth knowledge of various modules Accounting / Finance/ Manufacturing / Supply Chain etc     Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills.     Up to date on the latest technologies in ERPs

column2: As an Oracle Apps Technical Consultant, you specialize in developing and implementing technical solutions within Oracle's suite of enterprise applications, commonly known as Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS)      Your role involves working closely with clients, business analysts, and functional consultants to design, customize, and extend the Oracle EBS platform      Here are some key responsibilities associated with this role:Technical Design and Development: You analyze business requirements and translate them into technical designs      You develop and customize Oracle EBS components, such as forms, reports, interfaces, and workflows using Oracle development tools like Oracle Forms, Oracle Reports, Oracle Workflow, PL/SQL, and Oracle Application Framework (OAF)      Customization and Extensions: You configure and extend Oracle EBS functionality to meet specific business needs      This includes creating custom data fields, modifying existing application behavior, and developing extensions using Oracle's application development frameworks      System Integration: You integrate Oracle EBS with other systems, such as third-party applications or external databases      You develop and maintain interfaces and integrations using technologies like Oracle Application Integration Architecture (AIA), Oracle SOA Suite, or other integration tools      Performance Tuning and Optimization: You identify and resolve performance issues within Oracle EBS      This involves analyzing system performance, identifying bottlenecks, and implementing optimizations at the database and application levels      Technical Documentation: You create and maintain technical documentation, including functional and technical specifications, configuration documents, and development standards      You ensure that documentation is up to date and readily accessible for reference      Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution: You investigate and resolve technical issues reported by users or identified during testing      You perform root cause analysis, develop and implement solutions, and provide ongoing support to end-users      Testing and Quality Assurance: You participate in testing efforts, including unit testing, system integration testing, and user acceptance testing      You ensure that developed solutions meet the defined requirements and adhere to quality standards

column2: Responsibilities:  Responsible for building and maintaining an innovative mobile application in a cloud environment on Azure. Analyse requirements, prepare High-level/low-level designs and realize it with the project team. Lead a team of React Native software engineers, and take the delivery responsibility of the team. Forms the bridge between the Software Engineers Solution Analysts, and IT architects. Discusses technical topics (with the SEs, as a specialist), as well as holistic, architecture topics (with the IT Architects, as a generalist). Translates complex content to different stakeholders, both technical (like software engineers) as well as functional (business), in a convincing and well-founded way, and adapted to the target audience. Works in a support environment, eye for details, and is keen on optimizations. Profile Description:  Able to take care of all responsibilities mentioned in the above section. 12 to 15 years of experience in working on Mobile applications, of which at least 6 years in JavaScript, React and React Native. Minimum 6 years of experience of React Native and Typescript (be able to demonstrate contribution to a product build with React native). column2: Position   Overview We are seeking a talented and experienced Oracle Core HR and Journeys Consultant to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Oracle Human Capital Management (HCM) and Journeys implementation and support. As an Oracle Core HR and Journeys Consultant, you will be responsible for configuring, customizing, and maintaining the Oracle Core HR and Journeys module to meet the specific needs of our clients. You will work closely with clients to understand their HR processes and requirements, design solutions, and implement Oracle Core HR and Journeys functionalities to streamline HR operations and enhance organizational efficiency. Candidate should have good understanding of Oracle Benefits module. Key Role and Responsibility Should have a total of at least 8+ Years of IT experience with a minimum of 5+ years of experience on Oracle Core HCM and Journeys implementation and Support.  Collaborate with clients to gather business requirements and translate them into technical specifications for Oracle Core HR and Journeys implementation. Configure and customize Oracle Core HR module to meet client-specific needs, including organization structure setup, position management, employee data management, and other HR processes. Design and configure customer journey maps using Oracle Fusion Journeys platform, including defining journey stages, touchpoints, triggers, actions, and KPIs. Provide training and support to client teams on using Oracle Fusion Journeys platform, including best practices for journey design, configuration, and measurement. Configure and customize the Oracle Benefits module to align with client-specific benefits policies, eligibility rules, coverage options, and enrolment processes. Develop and implement data migration strategies to ensure smooth transition of HR data from legacy systems to Oracle Core HR. Design and implement security models and access controls to ensure data confidentiality and integrity within Oracle. Provide ongoing support and troubleshooting for Oracle Core HR and journey system issues, including resolving configuration errors, data discrepancies, and user inquiries. Conduct end-user training sessions and create user documentation to facilitate smooth adoption of system. Stay updated on latest Oracle HCM releases, patches, and updates, and assess their applicability to clients' needs. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including HR, IT, and business stakeholders, to ensure successful implementation of projects. Participate in system integration testing, user acceptance testing, and deployment activities to ensure successful rollout of Oracle Core HR and journey solutions.
column11: HCM, Oracle Hcm, Hcm Modules

column2: This is an exciting opportunity to join ION as a Senior Technical Consultant.          A Senior technical consultant is responsible for designing, coding, testing and implementing the customer requirements while mentoring other team members. Key Responsibilities:         Present the project s technical solution to client representatives.     Support client training services.     Consult with client s technology users to determine technical requirements to be addressed by the ION solution.     Provide guidance to Technical Consultants.     Follow ION documentation standards and resolution process flow for all deliverables.     Keep Line Manager and Project Manager(s) informed regarding the status of assigned responsibilities.     Maintain full chargeability on client account(s) as assigned.     On-site consultants may be required to travel to the customer site to work on projects as needed. Participate in and support the architectural design decisions regarding interfaces between Endur and other systems, as we'll as the technical approach for custom scripts and reports, and gain the client s confidence in the recommended approach. Gather and document technical requirements, code specifications, test plans/results, and any other deliverables required by the project as determined by the Project/Account Manager or Principal Technical Consultant. Experience working with at least one object-oriented languages such asC# .NET, Java, C++. Experience in the energy, commodities or financial field or working with an ETRM/ or CTRM system.     Experience in designing, configuring, and troubleshooting installations of enterprise software in client environments.     Experience in Interface design and implementation following standard integration patterns.     Experienced and skilled user of office productivity tools such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint, SharePoint and Project Server.     Experience writing technical specifications.     Strong understanding of relational database concepts.     Strong Object-Oriented Skills.     Excellent interpersonal skills.     Good written and oral communication skills.     Must be self-motivated, independent, resourceful and one who is capable of being objective and giving/taking constructive feedback.     Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.     For on-site consultants, ability to work onsite at client locations as needed.     Ability to deliver with little to no guidance from manager.      Ability to work as part of a project team structure. Experience working with Integrated Development environments such as Eclipse     Experience with business reporting tools such as SAP Crystal Report or Tableau.     Experience with source control and continuous integration tools (GIT, TFS, Confluence, Bamboo) and issue tracking systems (Jira) is required. column1: Senior S/4 HANA Consultant - SAP Production Planning & Manufacturing
column2: Job Title: Senior S/4 HANA Consultant - SAP Production Planning & Manufacturing SAP Experience??????? ?: ?5 to 10 ?Years  Location???????????????????? ?: ?Chennai  ABOUT OUR TECHNOLOGY TEAM Its a dynamic and results-oriented environment to work in ??but that?? why we like it. There are countless opportunities to learn and grow, whether that?? exploring new technologies in hackathons, or redefining the roles and work of colleagues, forever. Shape your own path, with support all the way. Diverse minds that work cross- functionally and broadly together. ABOUT THE PROGRAM: Axial is a strategic multi-year business transformation program helping to achieve its 2030 Bold Ambition. Axial will deliver the new backbone for our innovation, growth, and performance, and the technology driving Axial is SAP S/4HANA and its Business Technology Platform(s). The Axial Technology team actively partners with our business colleagues to deliver cutting-edge technology capabilities to fulfil AstraZeneca?? bold ambition of delivering life changing medicines to patients. Our ambition is to provide best-in-class expertise and leadership in technological solutions and Information Delivery that empowers our colleagues in the field and accelerates and improves strategic decision-making for a diverse range of partners.  Introduction to Role: As an S/4HANA Production Planning & Manufacturing Senior Consultant (SAP PP), you will be part of a wider SAP S/4HANA IT team that will lead on defining the IT and data solution that will support the global standardised business process. This is an exciting opportunity to be part of a team that is transforming our ability to develop life-changing medicines. Accountabilities: You will be responsible for supporting the integration between business process definition, SAP solution definition and SAP data objects definition. You will create the solution documentation that defines the global standard solution and ensures that it is fully and effectively tested in line with AZ testing standards. Essential Skills/Experience:  - SAP PP experience of 5 to 10 years and with good exposure on PP ??PI & Batch Management - SAP PP implementation / roll-out experience from design to completion of deployment - Track record of delivering SAP configuration design - SAP Certified in SAP S/4HANA Production Planning and Manufacturing - Experience of Pharmaceutical supply chain business activities and the required business outcomes within the relevant capability area - Good exposure to MES system like PASX and Shop floor systems like Systech / Metler Toledo. - Good knowledge on integration aspects and configuration dependencies with SAP - QM, MM, EWM, SD & FICO modules - Good understanding of Planning system (APO /OMP) integration with PP. - Keeps self, up to date on latest S/4 technologies and functionalities? - Demonstrated ability to work independently as well as part of a Team - Strong communication and presentation skills, a keen eye for detail - Strong team player able to work across the teams and communicate in business and IT terms - Comfortable with ambiguity and possessing an agile and open mindset - Self-motivated, demonstrated personal credibility and positive energy - Able to deliver large work efforts and meet challenging deadlines - Able to think out of the box, thrive in ambiguous and stressful situations Desirable Skills/Experience: - Worked in a hybrid environment with a mix of internal and external resources across geographical locations - Involved in S/4 stage 3 Prototype, Participated in F2S scenario building in S/4. - Involved in S/4 POC in production planning and good knowledge on S/4 Fiori Application relevant to PP. - Awareness about SAP Activate, EML, Agile, JIRA, SAP Solution Manager, BPML & Testing Tools - Exposure to SAP EWM / SAP QM will be an added advantage - Data Migration with S/4HANA Migration Cockpit - Knowledge on BTP and Other new SAP cloud offerings. - Experience In Interface Development (RFC/ALE/IDoc/Web Services). - Worked in a hybrid environment with a mix of internal and external resources in multiple geographical locations Education Background  -  Engineering Graduate or Postgraduate from reputed University

column2: Diverse Lynx is looking for Network Senior Consultant to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey.As a Network Senior Consultant, you will play a crucial role in designing, implementing, and maintaining complex network infrastructures for our clients.      You will be responsible for analyzing business requirements, assessing network architecture, and providing strategic recommendations to optimize performance, security, and scalability. This role requires a deep understanding of networking technologies, strong problem-solving skills, and the ability to communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.     Responsibilities : Network Design and Architecture : Collaborate with clients to understand their business needs and design scalable and resilient network architectures.Develop comprehensive network solutions that align with industry best practices and client requirements.Provide expertise in areas such as routing, switching, security, and network protocols.Implementation and Deployment : Lead the implementation and deployment of network solutions, ensuring seamless integration with existing infrastructure.Configure and optimize network devices, such as routers, switches, firewalls, and load balancers.     Conduct testing and validation to ensure the stability and performance of deployed solutions.Network Optimization : Perform assessments of existing network infrastructures and recommend improvements.Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks, security vulnerabilities, and other issues.Implement optimization strategies to enhance network efficiency and reliability.Security and Compliance : Collaborate with the security team to implement and maintain network security measures.Ensure that network solutions comply with industry regulations and security standards.     Conduct periodic security audits and recommend enhancements to mitigate potential risks.Documentation and Training : Create detailed documentation of network designs, configurations, and procedures.Provide training and knowledge transfer to internal teams and client personnel.Develop and maintain up-to-date documentation of network topology and configurations.Troubleshooting and Support : Act as a senior-level resource for resolving complex network issues.Provide support to junior team members and assist in escalated support cases.Participate in on-call rotation for critical network issues.
column11: Security audit, Network design, Networking protocols, Networking, Architecture, Network optimization, Network security, Troubleshooting, network architecture, deployment lead

column2: The Senior Consultants at Cyderes Group are the technical experts for the technology stack we deploy, often being recognized in the industry an expert in IAM and the associated technology. The Senior Consultant is responsible for designing and leading the technical deployments of IAM solutions at Cyderes Group. They often work as technical leads on customer projects and programs, advising on best practice for implementation and technical excellence.                  The Senior Consultant will lead and mentor a team of other consultants on their project or program. The successful candidate will have the opportunity to share their expertise with customers acting as a trusted advisor for topics within the IAM domain. They need to have extensive hands-on experience in deploying large complex IAM projects. column1: SAP Technical Consultant Cloud Integration & PI / PO
column2: Job description As a part of the cbs technical teams  we realize custom ERP developments, integration projects, and cloud apps for our global and internal customers. We create concepts, execute the implementation, and manage our projects. We are responsible for all phases of the software and project lifecycle based on our project methodology. To expand our local team in Kuala Lumpur, we are looking for  SAP Technical Consultant /?Solution Architect OR?Cloud Platform Consultant / Architect?/?Cloud Integration & PI / PO . Position:  SAP Technical Consultant / Solution Architect  OR  Cloud Platform Consultant / Architect  OR  Cloud Integration & PI / PO Modules : ABAP/ Product Development/ Cloud Platform/?BTP/ Understand Business processes/ PI/ PO/ CPI Location:  Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia Added Input:  Candidates possessing expertise in SAP Technical Consultant / Solution Architect  OR  Cloud Platform Consultant / Architect? OR  Cloud Integration & PI / PO?are encouraged to apply for this position. Upon submission of your application, a link to a questionnaire specific to the applied role will be provided. Kindly ensure timely completion and response to progress to the next phase of this application. Expectation and tasks as? SAP Technical Consultant /   Solution Architect: Analyze functional requirements, create technical design and approach for complex IT solutions. Implement solutions independently using state-of-the-art programming languages (ABAP 7.4+, CDS, SAPUI5, Java Script) and tools (SAP Web IDE, Eclipse, ABAP Workbench) Participate in an Agile software development cycle and collaborate with project managers as well as functional counterparts. Write technical documentation and test scripts. Share knowledge and experience with colleagues. Contribute to cbs best practices and methodologies. For Solution Architects, Perform architectural, technology and functional consulting in global SAP template and rollout projects, as well as being involved in areas such as customer support and project coordination. Act as technical team lead for the requested deliverables which includes adhering to the timeline, effort and assuring quality. Lead part of the software development cycle participating in tasks such as establishment of development guidelines, documentation standards, quality assurance, coaching of junior colleagues, and communication with relevant stakeholders Collaborate with the onsite European team. Evaluate new SAP technologies and supporting build know-how in these areas, integrate into cbs processes. Be responsible for a team of developers involving tasks such as team supervision/guidance, definition of work packages, coordination and controlling tasks within projects. Coach colleagues in functional, technical, and methodic topics. For the technology area, be responsible for cbs projects and customers as well as engage in pre-sales support in all kinds of SAP technology topics. Expectations and Tasks as for?Cloud Platform Consultant / Architect: Analyze functional requirements and design IT solutions in SAP environment. Implement customer requirements with Java, JavaScript, NodeJS, React, Angular, or SAP Business Technology Platform Write technical documentation and test scripts. Interest in projects using the newest technologies. Desire for a dynamic and prestigious work environment Expectations and Tasks as?Cloud Integration & PI / PO: Design and implement state-of-the-art end-to-end integration scenarios with SAP Integration Suite. Technical integration consulting and development as part of global SAP S/4HANA public and private cloud implementations. Integration of cloud solutions and platforms (SAP, Salesforce, Azure, AWS) and external business partners. Define integration architectures and guidelines. Interface migration from SAP PI/PO to SAP Integration Suite. Evaluate new technologies and solutions, helping our team to build and expand our expertise. Translate functional interface requirements to technical specifications. Be responsible for cbs projects and customers in the technology area as well as engage in pre-sales support in all kinds of SAP technology topics. Possibility to act as a technical team lead in integration and S/4HANA projects and to coach colleagues in functional, technical, and methodic topics. Collaboration with the onsite team. Desire for a dynamic and prestigious work environment. Job requirements Qualifications and Skills   for?SAP Technical Consultants /   Solution Architect: A degree in computer science, mathematics, engineering, or any other science topic, preferably with a background in business / industry & commerce. At least  8 years (Solution Architect) / 5 years (Senior Solution Developer) / 3 years (Solution Developer)  as an  SAP ABAP developer  in customer projects or a similar environment Applicants with  HCM   experience  are preferred. Knowledge in other programming languages such as JavaScript, HTML5, CSS or in topics such as HANA, SAPUI5, XSLT, Java, etc Having skills in  Data Migration (LTMC/LSMW), AIF, Process Integration/Orchestration, Cloud Platform Integration, Business Technology Platform, Fiori development would be an?advantage. Special matter expert knowledge in enhancing e. g. MDG Master Data Governance, GTS Global Trade Service, eWM (Warehouse Management), TM (Transport Management) desirable. Basic knowledge in using at least one SAP module in the areas of logistics or finance. Exposure to Agile Scrum methodologies beneficial Fluent in English (verbal and written) Work independently and organize ones tasks. Interest in projects using the newest technologies. Desire for a dynamic and prestigious work environment Qualifications and Skills   for?Cloud Platform Consultant / Architect: A degree in computer science, mathematics, engineering or any other science topic At least 2 years (Consultant) / 5 years (Senior Consultant) / 8 years (Solution Architect) of working experience in Java, Azure, or SAP being involved in customer projects or a similar environment. Knowledge in SAP Cloud Platform/BTP and ANY of the following: JAVA, Javascript, NodeJS, React or Angular SAP Fiori, Fiori Elements, SAP UI-5 Development GitHub, WebIDE, Business Application Studio Cloud Aplication Model (CAP), SAP SDK HANA Backend Development (XSJS, XSA, SQL) Process understanding in the modules like: Sales, Service, Logistics, Finance Interest in new technologies and innovations around SAP Excellent communication skills in English (verbal and written) required. Qualifications and Skills   for?Cloud Integration & PI / PO: A degree in computer science, mathematics, engineering or any other science topic, preferably with a background in business/ industry & commerce Multiple years of experience in SAP integration working with multiple projects and customers. Development skills in SAP Process Integration, SAP Process Orchestration or SAP Cloud Integration. Experience with SAP interface technologies (IDoc/ALE, RFC, Web Services, ABAP Proxy). Knowledge in ABAP, ABAP-OO, XSLT, Java and EDI standards like ANSI X.12 or EDIFACT. Good knowledge in using at least one SAP module in the areas of logistics (SD, MM, ). Experience with SAP Application Interface Framework (AIF) and other capabilities in SAP Integration Suite (i.e. API Management or Integration Advisor) is beneficial. Experience with other integration platforms, such as Boomi and Mulesoft are welcome, but not mandatory. Interest in solving challenges involving both business and technical. Excellent communication skills in English (verbal and written) and the desire to work in an international project environment. Ambition to take your own functional (SAP applications, business processes) and technical skills to the next level. Preference for applicants who are currently residing in Malaysia. ME: This is you An analytical and problem-solving consultant with the desire to develop your own skills and talents. An eloquent and extroverted person happy to support our pre-sales cycle. Passionate and determined while appreciating teamwork. Willing to take over responsibility and to make decisions. Able to lead a small team, with strong social and communication skills. WE: That's us A great team of passionate consultants Strong personalities that are fair, open, and respectful to each other Attractive and competitive salary and package A company that continuously spends more than 6% of its revenue in the education of its employees Interested in sharing the ONE passion? We?? love to hear from you! Don?? hesitate to contact us by phone, email or LinkedIn. We look forward to receiving your application documents, which should include your rsum (along with project descriptions), salary expectations, and references (if available). If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. Due to high volume of applicants, only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

column2: Job Purpose: As a Service Assurance Consultant, you will play a pivotal role in proactively providing our clients with monitoring, managing, and optimizing IT infrastructure services. Your expertise and industry knowledge will be leveraged to ensure our clients receive cutting-edge solutions tailored to their unique needs. You will work closely with our team of experts, contributing to our mission of delivering exceptional service. Main Duties & Responsibilities: -Design, develop, and implement monitoring solutions for TSOM (TrueSight Operations Management), BHOM (BMC Helix Operations Management) and AIOps (Artificial Intelligence for IT Operations). -Create and maintain service models to effectively represent IT services and their dependencies. -Plan, execute, and manage upgrades and migrations of existing monitoring solutions. -Monitor and troubleshoot IT infrastructure performance issues. -Proactively identify and resolve potential service disruptions to ensure service availability and performance. -Analyse and interpret monitoring data to identify trends and root causes of issues. -Generate reports and dashboards to visualise IT service health and performance metrics. -Stay updated with the latest advancements in Service Assurance, Operations Management tools and technologies. -Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams (Development, Operations, Security) to ensure optimal service delivery. Experience: - 5-7 years of experience in Service Assurance, IT Operations, or a related field. Knowledge: -Proven experience with TSOM, BHOM, or other enterprise monitoring solutions. -Strong understanding of service modelling concepts and methodologies (ITIL Service Management a plus). -Experience with scripting languages (e.g., Python, PowerShell) and APIs. Skills: -Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment. -Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams. -Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Qualifications: -Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field is preferred.Role & responsibilities

column2: Brief Description about the Project                      A Multicentre multi-method study for development and Validation of a Deprescribing Tool, followed by Implementation and evaluation of its impact, facilitators and barriers.                    The study will be done in three main steps      Formative research using Systematic/Rapid Review, Mixed methods study and a qualitative study. The intervention components will be then prioritized using Delphi process and will be locally customised.      The IP will be evaluated through a cluster RCT for effectiveness, implementation research outcomes and cost effectiveness.      In this step, we will disseminate the findings and learnings of the study through symposia s and we will conduct effective policy dialogues with key stakeholders.                   Language    : Good Communication in English                  Experience:    Candidate with work experience in at least two qualitative study projects and resultant published papers.                    Roles and Responsibilities    :                      Will be involved in the conduct of qualitative study for the 4-6 Intervention sites.      This will involve in-depth interviews and focus group discussion among key stakeholders to identify barriers and facilitators at the site level for effective implementation of the intervention and willing to travel to other cities

Salesforce Configuration and Customization: Configure and customize Salesforce Sales Cloud and Service Cloud to meet client requirements. Integration and Data Migration: Integrate Salesforce with external systems and applications using APIs, middleware, and integration tools. Technical Implementation: Develop custom functionality using Apex, Visualforce, Lightning Components, and other Salesforce technologies. Testing and Quality Assurance: Develop and execute test plans and test cases to ensure the quality and reliability of Salesforce solutions. Deployment and Release Management: Manage Salesforce deployments and releases across development, testing, and production environments. Coordinate deployment activities and ensure adherence to change management processes. Documentation and Training: Create technical documentation, including solution designs, configuration guides, and training materials. Conduct user training sessions and provide ongoing support and guidance to clients and end-users.

This role      is responsible for     implementing financial technology solutions using the OneStream software platform.                    OneStream is a modern, cloud-based solution in the Corporate Performance Management (CPM) space. CPM systems are used by large companies to manage several finance and accounting functions, including      consolidated     financial reporting, budgeting & planning, and account reconciliation. We hire individuals who are passionate about solving problems and bringing innovative ideas to our clients and our team. As part of the OneStream team, you will help build a practice that is able to      identify     and implement solutions to help our clients      utilize     technology to run their businesses more effectively. End to End implementation experience and strong hand on business rules is a must.     OneStream experience is an add on advantage     Good understanding of the financial and accounting processes (account reconciliations, intercompany eliminations, currency translation, allocations, and top-side adjustment) including proficient experience with financial close, consolidations, financial reporting, FP&A. Processing sales transactions accurately and efficiently, including operating cash registers and handling financial transactions.     Maintaining a clean and organized store environment, including merchandise displays and product shelves.     Building relationships with customers and promoting customer loyalty by providing exceptional customer service.     Staying knowledgeable about current products, promotions, and pricing, and being able to effectively communicate this information to customers.     Collaborating with team members to meet store sales goals and targets.     Continuously improving product knowledge and sales skills through training and development opportunities.     Adhering to company policies and procedures, including health and safety, loss prevention, and security.    >
column11: BRAND STORE CONSULTANT

column2: Responsible for the installation, configuration, and maintenance of SAP systems, including software upgrades, system backups, and performance tuning     Providing technical support to SAP users, resolving any technical issues that arise and providing guidance on the use of SAP systems     Monitoring the performance of SAP systems and takes steps to optimize their performance, such as implementing new hardware or reconfiguring existing systems     Responsible for managing user access to SAP systems, including setting up and maintaining user accounts, assigning roles and authorizations, and monitoring user activity     Responsible for managing and protecting sensitive data within SAP systems, including data backup and recovery procedures     Works closely with other internal teams, such as the IT, operations, and finance teams, to ensure that SAP systems meet the needs of the organization     Excellent problem-solving and critical thinking abilities     Excellent written and verbal communication skill

column2: Analyze business requirements and provide technical solutions using SAP ABAP programming language.     Design, develop, test, and implement SAP ABAP CDS Views.     Create technical specifications and documentation for SAP ABAP programs.     Work collaboratively with functional consultants and other technical team members to ensure successful implementation of SAP projects.     Participate in project planning, estimation, and status meetings.     Keep up-to-date with the latest SAP ABAP developments and technologies.                 Qualifications and Skills:                 Minimum 5 years of experience in SAP ABAP and CDS Development programming language.     Solid understanding of SAP architecture, database schema, and integration points with other modules.     Experience in developing and implementing custom solutions in SAP modules like SD, MM, FI, CO, PP, etc.     Experience in SAP S4HANA, CDS Views, AMDP Development.     Strong Knowledge on the SQL Concepts like Joins, Associations, Annotations.     Knowledge of Fiori, and UI5 would be an added advantage.     Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.     Strong communication and interpersonal skills.     Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment.       Ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities in a fast-paced environment.

column2: The Professional Services Consultant will provide training and consulting services on ESM products like BMC Patrol Suite,  NetIQ AppManager and NetIQ Security. Engagements typically begin by creating a deployment plan document specifically for each customer,  following by formal classroom training sessions,  and one- on- one mentoring,  with the majority of work done at the customer s location. The Consultant must be able to multi task in a fast- paced environment,  frequently working on multiple projects simultaneously.   This job involves:    Assist with scoping and preparation of Statements of Work (SOW) per engagement. Assist with the preparation of sections of Request for Information (RFIs) as required. Deliver training classroom,  on- site,  formal,  informal as and where required. Undertake technical consulting work such as implementation and training consulting.

column2: What we look for outside work parameters      Your expertise is your primary qualification, not your degree or certification.            ?Your publicly known contributions are your credentials         ?Papers you have written, tools you have developed are your references         ?Your write-up reflects your interests and ethics         ?Your published exploits, your CTF scores, and hall of fame listings are the testimonies of your work         ?Your research paper was published and presented at conferences         ?You are learning from the community and enthusiastically contributing back.               You are a perfect technical fit if:        ?Strong fundamental of application and network protocols         ?Stronghold on Web application security concept and penetration testing skill         ?Good command of at least one programming language         ?Good understanding of OWASP Top 10 and other web-related vulnerabilities as well as logic flaws         ?Hands-on experience in performing penetration testing of web-based applications preferably in the financial domain         ?Good to have experience in working alongside the developmentQA teams         ?Good report writing and presentation skills         ?Should be able to suggest optimum security improvements to application components.               You Have All Our Desired Qualities, if:        ?1-2 years of experience in web application and web service security assessment         ?You have a history of publishing or presenting good research         ?You have the knack of finding security bugs in everything you touch         ?You like automating stuff         ?You like writing tools         ?You have excellent written and verbal communication skills and the ability to express your thoughts clearly         ?You have the skill to articulate and present technical things in business language         ?You can work independently as well as within a team and meet project schedules and deadlines         ?You have strong problem solving, troubleshooting, and analysis skills         ?You are passionate about your area of expertise and self-driven         ?You are comfortable working in a dynamic and fast-paced work environment         ?You are Self-driven, proactive, hardworking, team-player         ?You are working on something on your own in your field apart from official work.               Your everyday work will look like:        ?Security assessment of web application and web service on various platforms         ?Back your findings with Proof-of-concept exploits         ?Collect evidence and maintain a detailed write-up of the findings         ?Understand and explain the results with impact on business and compliance status         ?Explain and demonstrate vulnerabilities to applicationsystem owners         ?Provide appropriate remediation and mitigations of the identified vulnerabilities         ?Individually or collaboratively review the system designs, source code, configurations, communications for security gaps.         ?Deliver results within stipulated timelines.         ?Sharpen your saw with continuous research, learning, training on the latest tools and techniques, keeping up with new research, and sharing the same with the ecosystem.         ?Communicate well using verbal and written skills, within and out of the team.
column11: Networking protocols, Publishing, Report writing, Finance, OWASP, Programming, Research, web application security, Troubleshooting, Penetration testing

column2: As an Oracle Apps Technical Consultant, you specialize in developing and implementing technical solutions within Oracle's suite of enterprise applications, commonly known as Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS)      Your role involves working closely with clients, business analysts, and functional consultants to design, customize, and extend the Oracle EBS platform      Here are some key responsibilities associated with this role:Technical Design and Development: You analyze business requirements and translate them into technical designs      You develop and customize Oracle EBS components, such as forms, reports, interfaces, and workflows using Oracle development tools like Oracle Forms, Oracle Reports, Oracle Workflow, PL/SQL, and Oracle Application Framework (OAF)      Customization and Extensions: You configure and extend Oracle EBS functionality to meet specific business needs      This includes creating custom data fields, modifying existing application behavior, and developing extensions using Oracle's application development frameworks      System Integration: You integrate Oracle EBS with other systems, such as third-party applications or external databases      You develop and maintain interfaces and integrations using technologies like Oracle Application Integration Architecture (AIA), Oracle SOA Suite, or other integration tools      Performance Tuning and Optimization: You identify and resolve performance issues within Oracle EBS      This involves analyzing system performance, identifying bottlenecks, and implementing optimizations at the database and application levels      Technical Documentation: You create and maintain technical documentation, including functional and technical specifications, configuration documents, and development standards      You ensure that documentation is up to date and readily accessible for reference      Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution: You investigate and resolve technical issues reported by users or identified during testing      You perform root cause analysis, develop and implement solutions, and provide ongoing support to end-users      Testing and Quality Assurance: You participate in testing efforts, including unit testing, system integration testing, and user acceptance testing      You ensure that developed solutions meet the defined requirements and adhere to quality standards
column11: Performance tuning, Manager Quality Assurance, Enterprise applications, Oracle forms, PLSQL, Application development, Unit testing, Troubleshooting, Technical documentation, Oracle Reports

column2: Troubleshoot, Analyze, replicate, regress and resolve complex field software problems reported by client or Account Managers.      Reproduce technical issues and work with Engineers to resolve them, by either establishing a workaround or a solution.      Interface with other technical support personnel, engineering and product management located around the world to escalate and resolve critical platform issues.      Prioritize customer issues and company projects effectively, communicating priorities and plans to management.      Maintain excellent relationships with internal and external customers by applying superb customer service and technical skills.      Coordinate, respond, assign, track and follow-up on product problems reported by internal or external clients.      Support Advertising Cloud search product during the launch of new clients.      Manage simultaneous projects of varying sizes & durations      Build and maintain monitoring and data analytics tools and dashboards      Minimum 4+ years industry experience in a technical support/consulting role, preferably in a high- tech setting      Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal      Ability to systematically and effectively troubleshoot problems while ensuring customer satisfaction within stated service level goals      Experience with SQL and Relational Databases (post-gres, MySql or Oracle). Snowflake experience is a plus      Expertise with creating dashboards and relevant alerts using monitoring tools (AlertManager/Grafana)      Experience with ingesting data in to monitoring tools(Prometheus) is a plus      Special consideration given for experience with PowerBI or alternative (tableau etc)      Research, reproduce and lead support case resolution efforts for product and technical issues
column11: Customer service, Technical support, SQL, Consulting, Oracle, MySQL, Product management, Service level, Monitoring tools, Customer satisfaction

column1: Sr Engr Cslt - Tech Product Mgt
column2: What you'll be doing... Verizon Communications (NYSE: VZ) is one of the world's leading providers of communications, information and entertainment products and services to consumers, businesses and governmental agencies. Within Verizon Communications, the Verizon Consumer Group (VCG) serves the consumer segment for both the company's wireless and wireline businesses, including wireless wholesale, with 2020 revenues of $88.5 billion, representing 69% of Verizon's consolidated revenues. The CXO within VCG will develop and execute VCG-as-a-Platform (VCG-aaP) strategy to enable business model expansion and operating model transformation. The Platform Strategy & Business Architecture function of the team will bring new strategic capabilities to VCG by shaping the long-term vision for platform aspirations, including the development of the vision, strategy, business architectureand business blueprint such that it underpins the overall VCG strategy. The position will collaborate closely with senior leadership across Verizon in developing an E2E business platform architecture that supports VCG's ambitions and in shaping strategic decisions and in providing guidance for future investments. The role will play a significant part in driving the team that is responsible for platform pipeline worth over $1B, enabling product pipeline worth over $10B, and supporting a cost basis of over $10B.The role will also drive and influence the roadmap for deployment of the technology budget of over $300m across the VCG. The Sr Cslt Tect Product Management Business Architecture will be in a visible role that requires a mix of proven team leadership skills, strong technical acumen, and experience in the commercialization of products (product to market) to drive the next generation of the VCG's platform aspirations. The Key will be to apply strategic thinking and technical understanding to be able to shape the modular architecture of business capabilities in support of the VCG-aaP strategy and roadmaps. The function's purpose is to partner with VCG CxOs, AI&D, GTS (NSA) to develop & evolve E2E business platform architecture, while shaping strategic requirements in close collaboration with the business (i.e., CxO demand). What we're looking for... Partnering with VCG CxOs, Chief Data Officer, and Global Technology Solutions to develop and evolve E2E business platform architecture Shaping business capabilities and platform modularity requirements in close collaboration with the business (i.e., CxO demand) Advising for strategic initiatives - Create Business Architecture documents for all CXO requests Aligning with VCG Agile Practice and yearly and 5 year planning exercises Building the business capabilities blueprint, identifying common components defining the requirements for commercialization while evangelizing this business architecture and blueprint with other parts of P&E organization for consistent strategic alignment Supporting VCG-as-a-Platform strategy by matching business needs with fit-for-purpose business capabilities Coordinating with other parts of the business to drive key artifacts to serve as/provide the backdrop to strategic platform development and enablement. Advising delivery teams on the art of the possible, informed by technology advancements Keeping the blueprint refreshed on a regular basis with inputs from the business, technology teams, and capital planning processes Working with the P&E team to continuously get inputs on evolving capabilities and gaps vis-a-vis market needs and identify changes to the business architecture blueprint accordingly You'll need to have: Bachelor's Degree or four or more years of experience. Six or more years of relevant experience. Experience in platform architecture and technology management experience in platform / technology led businesses Experience in business architecture development and management Experience in a large, complex organization with service offerings in the U.S. Experience in bringing an enterprise-wide perspective; understands all revenue streams and how channels operate across the organization and the importance of a coherent long-term corporate/ BU/ platform strategy Experience in the telecommunications industry and/or technical expertise in the development of business and/or enterprise architecture Experience or knowledge of digital market dynamics and best practices Experience operating and making appropriate adjustments in a complex, changing, dynamic environment Experience communicating and working with executive-level stakeholders on a regular basis. Even better if you have one or more of the following: MBA or higher degree in business or engineering. Tech strategy and/or telecom consulting experience Strong communication and interpersonal skills and the ability to create / deliver succinct executive-level presentations to communicate vision and concepts / opportunities to all levels of the organization Proven ability to manage issues through to resolution Extensive experience with developing and executing strategies and initiatives across business functions.  Extensive experience in successfully leading projects delivering E2E digital capabilities including technical design, process re-engineering, and technology.  Deep understanding of agile program delivery and methodology (certifications preferred) Experience creating road maps and detailed financial business cases for change, specifically developing robust business cases to support and prioritize new concepts / opportunities Experience with transformational projects at the enterprise level If Verizon and this role sound like a fit for you, we encourage you to apply even if you don't meet every even better qualification listed above. Additional Job Description Designs, develops, and manages activities for a specific product or group of products from product definition and planning through production, release, and end of life. Works on design, process, manufacturing, test, and quality as the product(s) move to production and distribution. Involvement lasts throughout all stages of a product's lifecycle including modifications, upgrades, and maintenance of the product or product line. Uses experience, expertise and skills to make recommendations and solve problems that are more difficult and infrequent. Work on project/product plans, schedules, and deliverables for assigned technical clients, working with the client to determine project strategies and objectives. Monitor project progress and results, intervening and developing solutions when necessary to ensure timelines and obligations are met.  Analyze, recommend and administer revisions or alternative solutions for product/process design, methods of procedure, or other project decisions. Manage and support the project/product budgets, identifying possible risks and opportunities. Interact with the various teams involved in the project, leading regular meetings and ensuring participants have the necessary resources to complete their tasks. Coordinate communication across teams/ stakeholder and provide status updates on projects.
column11: Product management, agile program delivery, Tech strategy, business architecture development, telecom consulting, enterprise architecture, project planning, project strategies

column2: Job Description We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Warehouse Management Systems (WMS) Project Lead & Technical Architect to lead and manage complex warehouse operations projects. This role requires a strong blend of leadership, technical expertise in WMS and AS400 systems, and the ability to collaborate effectively with business users and technical personnel. Key Responsibilities Lead and manage a team of junior systems analysts and client personnel assigned to warehouse operations projects. Work directly with business users to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues impacting warehouse operations and prevent business losses. Prioritize multiple incidents effectively and ensure timely resolution. Provide innovative enhancement/fix ideas to minimize production issues and support new development and system enhancements. Design and develop technical solutions using strong functional knowledge of WMS and PKMS applications. Utilize extensive experience in AS400 production support, maintenance, and new development, including proficiency in RPG/400, RPGLE, CL/400, CLLE, and DB2/400. Leverage expertise in design and label development using MarkMagic tool. Lead and manage projects within an Onsite-Offshore working model. Maintain strong analytical skills to identify and resolve complex technical issues Requirements Bachelor's degree in Business, Computer Science, Math, Engineering, or equivalent discipline. Minimum of seven years prior professional consulting experience or equivalent experience in the business process industry. Successful completion of at least two full life cycle implementations of an ERP system. Strong communication and presentation skills. Strong ability to facilitate discussions and negotiate mutually beneficial solutions.

column2: EY-Cyber Security-IAMConsulting- Risk As part of our EY-cyber security team, you shall engage in Identity & Access Management projects in the capacity of execution of deliverables. An important part of your role will be to actively establish, maintain and strengthen internal and external relationships. Youll also identify potential business opportunities for EY and GTH within existing engagements and escalate these as appropriate. Similarly, you??l anticipate and identify risks within engagements and share any issues with senior members of the team Your key responsibilities Manager in the Risk Advisory team to work on various Identity & Access Management projects for our customers across the globe. You will be responsible for overall client service quality delivery in accordance with EY quality guidelines & methodologies. You will need to manage accounts and relationships on a day-to-day basis and explore new business opportunities for the firm. Establishing, strengthening and nurturing relationships with clients (functional heads & key influencers) and internally across service lines and proactively will also be a part of your day-to-day activities. You will assist in developing new methodologies and internal initiatives, and help in creating a positive learning culture by coaching, counselling and developing junior team members. In line with EY?? commitment to quality, you??l confirm that work is of the highest quality as per EY?? quality standards, by reviewing the work provided by junior members. Your client responsibilities:? Provide guidance and share knowledge with team members and participate in performing procedures focusing on complex, judgmental and/or specialized issues. Work with the team and the client to create plans for accomplishing engagement objectives and a strategy that complies with professional standards and addresses the risks inherent in the engagement? Brief the engagement team on the client's environment and industry trends. Maintain relationships with client management to manage expectations of service, including work products, timing, and deliverables. Demonstrate a thorough understanding of complex information systems and apply it to client situations? Use extensive knowledge of the client's business/industry to identify technological developments and evaluate impacts on the client's business. Demonstrate excellent project management skills, inspire teamwork and responsibility with engagement team members, and use current technology/tools to enhance the effectiveness of deliverables and services. Understand EY and its service lines and actively assess what the firm can deliver to serve clients Assist Partners & Senior Managers in driving the business development process on existing client engagements by gathering appropriate resources, gaining access to key contacts & supervising proposal preparation. Create innovative insights for clients, adapts methods & practices to fit operational team needs & contributes to thought leadership documents. Practice secondment for developing new methodologies. Facilitate discussions / knowledge sharing with key client personnel and contribute to EY thought leadership. Plan & schedule client engagements. Determine and deploy the right team with adequate skill sets for executing engagements and periodically review status of engagements and work products.? Demonstrate strong project management skills Maintain a strong client focus by effectively serving client needs and developing productive working relationships with client personnel. Stay abreast of current business and economic developments and new pronouncements/standards relevant to the client's business. Demonstrate industry expertise (deep understanding of the industry, emerging trends, issues/challenges, key players & leading practices) Review status updates and prepare management presentations Actively contribute to improving operational efficiency on projects & internal initiatives. Your people responsibilities:? Identify buyers, influencers & stakeholders in existing client engagements and build strong relationships. Display teamwork, integrity and leadership. Work with team members to set goals and responsibilities for specific engagements. Foster teamwork and innovation. Drive performance management for self and team. Driving the quality culture agenda at GTH? Manage the performance management for the direct reportees, as per the organization policies Training and mentoring of project resources Participating in the organization-wide people initiatives Mandatory skills:? Strong understanding of Identity Access Management concepts Hand's on experience on end to end implementation of Identity and Access Management tool Should have completed at least 10 implementations Strong industry focus Hands-on Development experience on Provisioning Workflows, triggers, Rules and customizing the tool as per the requirements Strong understanding of Authentication and Authorization techniques Capability of understanding the business requirement and converting that into design Strong project management skills? Advanced written and verbal communication skills and presentation skills? Excellent leadership, teamwork and client service skills? Demonstrated integrity within a professional environment? Successful candidates must work in excess of standard hours when necessary. A valid passport is required? Graduates /BE / M Sc (Stats, Maths, Computer Science) / MBA with background in computer science and programming /MCA with 5 to 8 years of experience Preferred skills:? Prior Client facing experience Hands on java development and debugging experience? Strong Understanding of Java API??, libraries and methods? Familiarity with any Java Framework ( Struts/ Spring) is an additional advantage Should be capable of at dissecting large problems and designing modular, scalable solutions Strong familiarity of application servers such as Tomcat and ?WebLogic Should have good understanding of RDMS and SQL queries Exposure to Unix/Linux environments with knowledge of commands & shell scripting Good knowledge of information security and risk management concepts. Fair knowledge on information security standards and regulations. Tool Specific Mandatory skills:? SailPoint? Completed the SailPoint implementer Training Hands-on Development experience on Provisioning Workflows, triggers, Rules and customizing the tool as per the requirements Hands-on experience on SailPoint Migration projects Hands-on User Access Certification development and testing experience is a bonus Use case design, Solution Requirements Specification and mapping business requirements to technical requirements (Traceability Matrix) Architecture Design (optimising the resources made available ??servers and load sharing etc.) Involvement in a successful Pursuit of a potential SailPoint client by being part of the RFP response team Hands on Custom connector development experience is a bonus Hands on experience on Integration with other IAM tools like ITIM Please share your profile only if it is matching our JD to vanacia.a@gds.ey.com

column2: Job Description: As a Senior .NET Developer with a strong focus on Azure, you will be a key player in our dynamic team, responsible for developing and deploying web applications and APIs. Your role will involve deploying applications to Azure, with a preference for Azure Virtual Machines (VMs), and configuring applications for optimal performance. In addition, you will be instrumental in defining Azure DevOps Pipelines for efficient code management and deployment from Git repositories. Your logical analysis and problem-solving skills will be invaluable in resolving complex technical challenges. Key Responsibilities: Utilize a minimum of 5 years of robust .NET development experience to create and maintain ASP.NET Web Apps and APIs. Deploy applications to Azure, with a focus on Azure VMs, and ensure successful application configuration. Define and implement Azure DevOps Pipelines to automate code building, standard scans, and deployment from Git repositories to Azure VMs. Demonstrate proficiency in JSON, ARM template creation, and PowerShell scripting for provisioning Azure VMs and associated resources (e.g., VNet, Storage, Key Vault). Implement CI/CD configurations for efficient development and deployment workflows. Leverage Git usage knowledge for effective version control. Utilize PowerShell scripting to automate Azure resource management. Good to have knowledge in EV2 Template creation and deployments (a plus). Qualifications: A minimum of 5 years of .NET development experience, with a strong emphasis on ASP.NET Web App and API Development. Hands-on experience with the Azure platform, including deploying applications and managing Azure resources. Proven ability to define and implement Azure DevOps Pipelines for code management and deployment automation. Strong logical analysis and problem-solving skills. Proficiency in JSON, ARM template creation, and PowerShell scripting. Knowledge of CI/CD configurations. Familiarity with Git for version control. Good to have knowledge in EV2 template creation and deployments. Please send your resume and a cover letter outlining your relevant experience to  adithyan@wrootsglobal.in  . We look forward to hearing from you and potentially welcoming you to our team!

Learn more at? www.invenioLSI.com . Role - SAP Basis Senior Consultant Job Summary: The SAP Sr. Basis Administrator is responsible for the technical implementation, maintenance, and support of SAP systems. This role involves configuring, monitoring, and optimizing SAP landscapes to ensure high performance, availability, and security. The SAP Basis professional works closely with other IT teams and business stakeholders to deliver reliable SAP solutions that meet organizational needs. SAP Skills: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. 7+ years experience in SAP Basis administration and technical support. Proficiency in SAP system installation, configuration, and maintenance. Knowledge of SAP architecture, components, and technologies (e.g., SAP NetWeaver, SAP HANA). Experience with SAP system upgrades, patch management, and performance tuning. Understands of database administration concepts, particularly with SAP HANA. Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure) and virtualization technologies. Responsibilities: System Administration : Install, configure, and maintain SAP systems (ECC, S/4HANA, BW/4HANA, etc.) and related components such as SAP NetWeaver, SAP Solution Manager, SAP HANA, and SAP Fiori. Performance Tuning : Monitor system performance, analyze bottlenecks, and implement performance optimization measures to ensure optimal SAP system performance. System Upgrades and Patch Management : Plan and execute SAP system upgrades, support package update, and system migrations in accordance with best practices and company guidelines. System Monitoring and Troubleshooting : Monitor system health, proactively identify and resolve issues, and respond to system alerts and incidents to minimize downtime and ensure system availability. RedHat OS security patching update : Help customer update the RedHat 8.9 OS security patching in DEV, QAS and Production every month. Oracle Bundle patch update : Plan and execute the quarterly Oracle bundle patch update for SAP systems. Documentation and Knowledge Sharing : Create and maintain technical documentation, procedures, and guidelines. Share knowledge and provide training to team members and end-users as needed. Project Support : Provide technical support and expertise for SAP implementation projects, system migrations, and other initiatives as required. Role & responsibilities

column2: As the SNP Bluefield Migration Consultant with SAP SD/OTC (Sales and Distribution/Order to Cash) experience, you will play a pivotal role in migrating supply chain planning processes and systems from SAP ECC to SAP S/4HANA using the SNP Bluefield approach.  Your expertise in SAP SD/OTC modules will be essential in ensuring a smooth transition and optimizing the order fulfillment process in the new SAP S/4HANA environment. Migration Planning: Collaborate with client stakeholders to assess current SAP ECC SD/OTC processes, identify migration requirements, and develop a comprehensive migration plan leveraging the SNP Bluefield methodology. Solution Design: Work closely with client teams to design the target state supply chain planning solution in SAP S/4HANA, focusing on optimizing order management, pricing, delivery, and billing processes using SAP SD/OTC modules.  SAP SD/OTC Expertise: Provide expert guidance and support in configuring SAP SD/OTC modules in the new SAP S/4HANA environment, ensuring alignment with industry best practices and client requirements. Data Migration: Oversee the migration of SD/OTC master data, transactional data, and configuration settings from SAP ECC to SAP S/4HANA, ensuring data integrity, accuracy, and completeness throughout the migration process. Testing and Validation: Develop test scenarios, conduct system testing, and facilitate user acceptance testing for SAP SD/OTC processes to ensure that the migrated solution meets functional requirements and quality standards. Training and Knowledge Transfer: Provide training and knowledge transfer sessions to client teams on the use of SAP SD/OTC functionality in SAP S/4HANA, including system navigation, process flows, and best practices. Education: Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, Supply Chain Management, or a related field.  Advanced degree or relevant certifications in SAP SD/OTC are desirable. Minimum of 5-7 years of experience in SAP SD/OTC implementation and support, with a focus on order management, pricing, delivery, and billing processes. Below Interested candidates can apply in Below Fujitsu link. https://r.ripplehire.com/s/bPLZQ
column11: SAP SD, HANA, OTC

column2: Job description We are looking for an Identity and Access Management Architect. The main scope of work includes everything from IAM project design and development, implementation, administration and support. Expertise in more than 5 years into Saviynt.   Roles and Responsibilities: Design and implement Saviynt solutions to meet the security and compliance requirements of our organization. Configure the REST connector with different platform applications. Hands-on experience on JAVA with respect to IGA. Good to have experience who worked on heavy Saviynt instance of 1L+ users. Configure the child applications and direct integrations. Good to have knowledge on SAP, ABAP connect, SCIM connector and SAP cloud application provisioning. Must hands on experience on Success factor, SAP HANA connector and JDBC connector. Must hands-on experience on Saviynt features like Custom action, Technical and user update rules, endpoints, analytics, SODs, Certifications, Service Accounts, custom integrations, connections, roles, RBAC, DB structure and SSO etc. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and define the scope of Saviynt projects. Develop and maintain technical documentation, including architecture diagrams, design specifications, and implementation plans. Configure and customize Saviynt modules to align with our organization's security policies and procedures. Conduct regular audits and assessments to identify vulnerabilities and recommend remediation actions. Provide technical guidance and support to the Saviynt implementation team, ensuring successful deployment and integration of Saviynt solutions. Stay up to date with the latest industry trends and best practices in Saviynt architecture and enterprise security. Preferred candidate profile     Bachelors degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field. 5 to 10 years of experience in the Enterprise Security domain, with a focus on Saviynt architecture and implementation. Strong knowledge of Saviynt modules, including Identity Governance and Administration (IGA), Access Request and Certification, and Access Analytics. Experience in designing and implementing Saviynt solutions for large-scale organizations. Proficient in programming languages such as Java, Python, or PowerShell. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams

column2: Position: Senior Consultant SAP EWM/WM (IT Services Company) Role: - You are the driving force behind the digital transformation of our customers, whether customer support or system updates - you take on every challenge. - You map and maintain the logistics processes of our customers from various industries with the help of the modern standard software SAP EWM and/or WM. - In concrete terms, this means that you will support the ERP applications, develop them further and thus independently accompany the preparation for S/4HANA by  a)	carrying out requirements analyses and writing specifications, creating concepts for systemic solution strategies and implementing them or having them implemented using the latest SAP technologies.  b)	support the implementation of SAP ERP solutions and design (integration) strategies for the IT landscape.  - Together with your team, you will continue to expand and develop your SAP Logistics unit, because we have big plans!  Requirements: - 5-8+ yrs of experience - High customer and service orientation, that can be combined with initiative and strong communication skills to support our quality-oriented customers. - Bachelor degree in Technology, business administration or training with relevant professional experience - 3 years of professional experience in the aforementioned daily business (customizing) around SAP Logistics and are confident in the EWM and/or WM modules. - Experience in the S/4HANA environment and/or initial experience with other logistics modules such as SD, MM, LE, GTS, PP, QM or PM.  - Enthusiasm and a willingness to learn  - A willingness to travel for service/project-related reasons and very good English skills round off your profile. Location: Kochi, Kerala This position is for a Client of Vertex Corporate Services which is an IT Services Company

Responsibilities:       * Workday HCM Functional Development:     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements    and translate them into Workday HCM solutions.     * Strong proficiency in Business Process Configuration, Advanced Reporting,    and Dashboards within the Workday environment.     * Design, develop, and implement Workday configurations, custom reports, and    integrations to meet business needs.     * Provide ongoing support, troubleshooting, and optimization of Workday    functionality.     * iCIMS ATS Configuration Management:     * Hands on configuration and administration of iCIMS ATS to ensure optimal    performance and functionality.     * Customize and maintain iCIMS workflows, forms, and templates based on    business requirements.     * Manage updates to integrations between iCIMS ATS and workday.     * Experience with reporting and dashboards within the iCIMS environment.     * Expertise in iForms management and maintenance.       Qualifications:       * Bachelors degree in a related field or equivalent work experience.     * 5+ years of Proven experience in Workday HCM functional development,    including configuration and customization.     * Experience in iCIMS ATS configuration management.     * Strong understanding of HR processes and best practices.     * Ability to analyze and troubleshoot complex technical issues related to HR    systems.     *    Nice to     have    - workday Benefits, Advanced compensation, Learning and Talent    and performance      * Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
