column2: Responsibilities: In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience with SAP BTP, including familiarity with various services and capabilities it offers.? Proficiency in using SAP Cloud Platform tools and services like SAP Cloud Foundry, SAP HANA, SAP Fiori, SAP Mobile Services, and SAP Integration Suite.? Strong programming skills in languages like Java, JavaScript, or Python.? Experience with SAPUI5/Fiori development for creating user-friendly interfaces.? Knowledge of SAP Cloud Application Programming Model (CAPM).? Understanding of cloud computing concepts and experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).? Knowledge of DevOps practices and tools for cloud deployment and automation.? Proficiency in working with databases, especially SAP HANA.? Data modeling skills for designing efficient data structures and schemas.? Expertise in integrating SAP BTP with other systems and applications.? Knowledge of RESTful APIs, OData, and message-based integration techniques.? Familiarity with SAP Analytics Cloud or other SAP reporting and analytics tools.? Ability to create meaningful insights from data stored in SAP BTP.? Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and resolve complex technical issues.?  Experience in managing or participating in SAP BTP projects, including project planning, execution, and documentation.? Depending on the specific job, industry-specific knowledge may be required (e.g., healthcare, manufacturing, finance).? The ability to adapt to evolving SAP BTP technologies and stay updated with the latest trends and updates in the SAP ecosystem.? Collaboration skills to work effectively within cross-functional teams.? Relevant SAP certifications can add credibility to your profile. Consider certifications such as SAP Certified Development Associate - SAP Cloud Platform, and others related to the specific aspects of SAP BTP you are involved in.? Attention to detail, time management, and the ability to work under pressure are often valuable attributes for a consultant.? Effective written and verbal communication skills to interact with clients, team members, and stakeholders.? Desired Candidate Profile   A bachelor's degree in a relevant field such as computer science, information technology, or business is often required.? SAP certifications related to SAP BTP, such as SAP Certified Development Associate, can be a significant advantage. CANDIDATES MUST HAVE A VALID H1B VISA.

column2: Looking for a self-driven highly skilled developer to join PI/PO development in CT SCM/EDI competence center. This person will work in a dynamic environment and focus on PI/PO upgrade/migration and have the desire to learn and grow with all things PI/PO including but not limited to it.          This position is responsible for providing the design, configuration, testing, documentation and deployment of PI/PO application for all BU. The role will require work directly with the business and other IT competence centers to define requirements and advice technical solutions.          System Change Requests: Follow the system change process by carrying out tasks as required during the full lifecycle of a system change request resulting in process improvements per defined business requirements.          Administration, Communication and Documentation: Establish responsible deadlines and manage time effectively; accurately prepare written business correspondence that is coherent, grammatically correct, effective and professional; establish effective working relationship with business users; seek input from mentors and supervisors.          Business Process Analysis and Improvements: Assist with business requirements gathering sessions and prepare assigned deliverables resulting in detailed and fully documented business requirements definitions. Implement system solutions that result in business process improvements that increase business efficiencies and effectiveness.          Project and Teamwork: Perform as a project team member and sometimes a project team lead on project implementations; executing assigned tasks resulting in successful, on time and on budget projects. Provide value as a team member in cross functional implementations while demonstrating effective interpersonal skills resulting in successful systems implementations.        Professional Experience:        Requires a minimum of 7+ years of working experience with SAP PI/PO development          Experience with PO 7.5 versions and/or higher          Experience with using NWDS          Solid experience with ALE, IDocs, BAPI, RFCs, ABAP proxies & Alert configurations.          Requires a good understanding of SAP PI/PO (SLD/ESR/ID) and familiar with different PI/PO adapters such as OFTP2, SFTP/FTP, REST, AS2, HTTP/S, SOAP, JDBC, RFC, IDOC, etc.          Experience with EDI EDIFACT, ANSIX12, VDA, etc.          Experience with B2B and EDI integration using B2B Addon          Experience with different mappings including creating Java, UDFs, XSLT.          Experience with J2SE/J2EE development        Knowledge & Skills        Experience with PI/PO migration          Experience with S4 HANA          Experience with PI administration and certificate handling          Experience with SAP ERP connectivity setup          Experience with Automotive Industry        Intercultural Experience        Strong problem-solving skills with well-organized and structured work habits.          Excellent verbal and written communication skills.          Excellent interpersonal skills and ability to function well in a team or independently.          Able to work flexible working hours as required        Role Expectation        Primary responsibility of PI support consultant to make sure Production system is up and running.          Have extensive monitoring experience for message monitoring, communication channel monitoring, cache monitoring, performance monitoring in PI.          Also, expert in ERP system monitoring including IDOC and queue monitoring.          Experienced to handle any issue occurred in Production system raised by users to be resolved within the SLA.          Expert of handling incidents and tickets causing service disruption in the PI landscape          PO mailbox monitoring to track alert and get track the issue.          Experience to maintain the monitoring report of PI message flow includes successful as well as failed. Co-ordinate with other teams if issue require multiple team involvement.          Capable of fixing mapping errors, Communication channel error.          Expert handling certificates in NWA and other keys.          Have experience in PI Admin activities in NWA

column1: Dynamics CE / Dynamics CRM Technical Architect
column2: We enable financial institutions to become digital leaders.    As a professional team of global scale, we work with best clients for great and exciting projects, in an environment where we learn amazing things every day. Each code, each voice, each contribution, each challenge, each success is celebrated here. We welcome candidates who share our values, have the skills and are  passionate to enjoy our journey to build the digital future of finance, together. We are looking for Dynamics CE / Dynamics CRM Technical Architect with 10+ years of experience in assisting solution design, and implementation of Microsoft Dynamics CRM/ Dynamics 365 solution for Omni-Channel Banking applications such as internet banking, mobile banking, CRM and loan origination.  What you will be doing:  Apply the functional resources/business analysts with requirements gathering and provides design guidance for mid to large sized Dynamics 365 (CRM)/CE projects.  Provides leadership and technical guidance to the project team throughout the implementation to ensure accurate delivery of project plans.  Provides current best practices and solution alternatives as part of functional or technical design documents.  Advise pre-sales & technical teams on best practice architectures for internal and customer facing solutions. This can be a reactive response to a customer need or request for proposal and include participating in proof-of-concepts, making product demonstrations, presentations and preparing Dynamics 365 Online consumption estimates for the proposed solution architectures.  Understand customers overall data estate, IT and business priorities and success measures to design implementation architectures and solutions using advanced analytics and artificial intelligence  Mentoring and leading VeriPark project team members and customers to be proficient in delivering Online and On-Prem based solutions. This can also include identifying architectural problems in projects, providing solutions to these problems and participating in software development processes to help implementing new technologies.   Identify, build, drive programs and R&D studies to establish new technical practices and learn private or public preview cutting-edge technologies.  Documenting and sharing designs, technical best practices / insights with internal teams   Maintaining and advancing technical skills and knowledge, keeping up to date with technology trends and competitive insights on cloud and on-prem technologies.  Assisting solution design, and implementation of Microsoft Dynamics CRM/ Dynamics 365 solution. Responsible for application architecture and design decisions during a project. Works to map overall design to requirements and systems, ensuring solutions align with business goals and processes, and fit within the enterprise context. What we are looking for:  10+ years of experience in Microsoft Dynamics CRM/ Dynamics 365/Dynamics CE   Bachelor's Degree in IT, Computer Science  Professional certification in CRM or agree to achieve appropriate certification in agreed upon timeframe   Deep knowledge of Dynamics 365 for Sales, Field Service, Customer Service, Marketing, Portals, USD and other emerging Microsoft software.  Ability to design, configure and deploy Dynamics CRM solutions based on complex XRM solutions with multiple customizations, plugins and batch/real-time integrations.  Strong analytical and problem-solving skills that enable comprehension and resolution of complex business and technical issues  Enthusiastic team-player as well as a self-motivated  Innovative, open minded and proactive  Excellent English skills   What we are offering: Remote Freedom, Your Way:  At VeriPark we believe in the power of talent, no matter where it resides. Design your ideal workspace and achieve the perfect work-life balance. Performance-Linked Bonus:  Your hard work doesn't go unnoticed! Enjoy a performance-linked bonus as a testament to your dedication! Rewards Beyond the Job:  Enjoy a comprehensive benefits package, including Remote Work Support, Health Insurance, Care Program, and Online Psychological Support. We care you! Birthday Leave, Because You Matter:  We value your special moments! Take the day off on your birthday and treat yourself. Global Impact, Cutting-Edge Tech:  Immerse yourself in global projects with top-tier clients and stay ahead with cutting-edge technologies. Your skills will shape the future of our industry. Unleash Your Potential:  Develop yourself with VeriPark Academy opportunities; webinars, and in-house training sessions. Diverse, Vibrant Community:  Be part of a dynamic environment that values diversity and inclusivity. Together Culture:  Even in a remote world, we cultivate connections through engaging face-to-face gatherings as well as online fun events. Special information sharing environment where you can update & align yourself. Apply now and let's shape the future together. About VeriPark: We are a global technology company with more than two decades of expertise in the Financial Services industry. Our mission is to enable financial institutions to become digital leaders by delivering world class customer journeys in digital and assisted channels. We develop omni-channel delivery, customer engagement (CRM), branch automation and loan origination solutions based on Microsoft technology (Azure, Dynamics 365, Power Platform) for banks and insurance companies worldwide.  With offices in 15 countries from Canada over Europe and the Middle East to Kuala Lumpur, our 900+ colleagues are serving customers in more than 30 countries worldwide.      https://www.veripark.com
column11: Dynamics 365, Solution Architecting, MS Dynamics CRM, Dynamics Ce, CRM
